title: Weather forecast
description:
Weather, Weather channel, Weather forecast app forecasts weather daily & hourly
Weather forecast app is a weather channel which has accurate weather information.

Weather forecast is very helpful with everybody. If you know weather information, You can prepare your plan carefully, you will be sucessful at work and have better life.
Please download our Weather forecast app. You will see that Weather today is updated hourly. Weather forecast app also has a weather report on weather tomorrow, weather for today, also 10 day weather forecast
Weather forecast app is a weather channel let you manage weather of many locations. On home screen, users see weather of their locations. Then users can go to other screens for location management. Users can add London weather, Paris weather, San Francisco weather, Houston weather

Weather app detects weather forecasts in your current location automatically. There are many information in weather forcasts which includes atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction, in addition to ten days future forecast, also hourly weather forecast.
Realtime temperature, humidity, pressure, wind force and wind direction are all in this weather app based.

Weather app has a lot of features:
- Free. It is a free Weather channel, weather network.
- Global. You can see weather in any places you like, ex: London weather, Paris weather, San Francisco weather, Houston weather
- Full report. Displays all information of weather: location time, temperature, atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction
- Live weather forecast for free: this weather and climate app offers daily weather, hourly weather forecasts and monthly weather forecasts. Meanwhile, it also provides interstate travel weather forecasts and forecast weather and wind.
- Today, tomorrow, 3 days later, 7 days later. Weather for today, tomorrow’s weather, … hourly weather in each hour.
- detect your location by network or GPS.
- Manage the weather reports in multiple locations
- Has weather notifications. If you don't like you can turn off this feature
- Weather forecast is very accurate and reliable

This is second version of weather and weather forecast app. We will try our my best to make this daily weather forecast app better and better.
please download weather forecast app and use as a weather channel to get weather information hourly and daily

summary: Weather, Weather channel, Weather forecast app forecasts weather daily & hourly
comments: Very detailed and comprehensive app that provides an abundance of data and predictions, to make even the Met Office be able to delve into the deepest crevices of weather. IMO, good app, but just a little too much detail for the average user, who just needs to know if it's going to rain, snow, or become a heatwave. A stripped down version would suit me, as a widget on my Android .

Wonderful app, very reliable. The first thing I do each morning is check the weather, to find out what is ahead for the day. I can proudly state that the weather forecast that I get from this app, is far and above more accurate than anything else out there. Oh by the way, it's absolutely FREE. You can't beat free. I highly recommend this app ... without any reservations - PERIOD!

It's nice and fairly accurate. Couple of strikes against it though *I don't want a large home screen widget. And the smallest of them also shows me the time??? My phone already does that *the time is the only part of the widget that updates quickly. The widget doesn't follow my location, and the temperature takes forever to update

I just love this app. My car was in the shop for quite a while and I had to rely on a bicycle. So I would ride my bike to the bus, (45 mintues away) then take two buses to get to my 1st job. Then walk 10 mintues to my job. When off from the 1st job at 3:30 p.m. take the same 2 buses back and report in to my 2nd job. This app help me to know what the weather would be like in advance. And when waking up at 2:15 a.m. to start your day because your car is in the shop is Beyond very helpful. MLP

The actual app seems good enough at a glance, we'll see how I feel about it in a week. I do, however, take offense at the fact that the first thing I saw after setup was a full-screen ad that I had to close. Pop-up ads are unconscionable on desktop systems, so I don't know why you'd ever consider it appropriate within an app.

title: Weather Radar, Live Maps - The Weather Channel
description:
Weather your way: face all weather conditions this winter with The Weather Channel, an IBM Business. Get live radar updates and check the local weather conditions on the go. Get ready for what's ahead with your weather map, storm radar and local weather forecast.

Live weather radar, snow storm and blizzard tracker, as well as your local temperature - available wherever you are! Get your daily local weather map and temperature info this winter, so you can prepare for your day with confidence. Living in an area prone to severe weather? Our storm radar and GPS tracker have got you covered. The Weather Channel provides an accurate weather forecast that helps you plan up to 15 days in advance, with NOAA alerts and severe weather recommendations.

Ski trip coming up? Don't get caught in a snow storm or blizzard - plan your ski break with our detailed weather tracker to make sure you can hit the slopes.
Track your local weather map and live weather radar and prepare for what's ahead, whether that's the first snow of the season, a crisp and sunny day, or severe weather. Our practical GPS maps and storm radar will help you face whatever the clouds will bring.

Track weather alerts thanks to our live weather radar! Discover The Weather Channel’s top 5 features:

1. Weather your way! Get a personalized live weather map and check weather conditions in a new way. Discover a live radar, a snow tracker, and our new Feels Like feature to get an accurate idea of how it feels outside.
2. NOAA weather alerts that you can subscribe to - Press push notifications and get real time notifications for all severe weather updates, be it a snow storm, rain, or blizzard.
3. Track weather alerts & conditions - Stay alert for winter weather with our snow GPS, and track weather alerts with our storm radar.
4. Smart videos! Discover visuals of NOAA alerts and track on a GPS map the development of a snow storm.
5. Track the flu spread with Flu Insights with Watson - We can now predict the flu risk up to 15 days in advance, and we’ll alert you when there’s an increased risk in your area.

Stay alert: track travel weather and plan winter outdoor activities with confidence.
• Weather maps & weather forecast updates give you all the information you need, wherever you are! Know what to expect before you even set foot outside, from temperature to wind chills.
• Don’t get caught in the rain! With NOAA alerts, a weather forecast up to 48 hours and our live weather radar, you will be prepared for anything.
• Daily temperature, wind speed and weather maps let you know if you need to bring a light jacket, sunglasses or your umbrella!
• Run smart with Running Index! Find the best running conditions by examining the temperature and detailed wind speed updates to plan your perfect route!
• Ski weather - Our snowfall forecast helps you decide when to plan your next ski outing.

Keep informed on the latest weather news.
• Stay prepared during extreme weather events and earthquakes. We’ll send you live alerts, so you’ll always be aware.
• Our live radar will help you track extreme weather where you live.

Enjoy our Premium version! Get all the information you need regarding local weather and temperature.
• See the forecast for the next 96 hours
• Plan your day without the inconvenience of ads for just $0.99.

Be alert and get all the information you need with live news and maps.

-----
 Privacy & Feedback
• Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://weather.com/en-US/twc/privacy-policy  
• Our Terms of Use can be viewed here:http://www.weather.com/common/home/legal.html 
• If you have any questions or suggestions, please get in touch at android.support@weather.com.

 According to App Annie, The Weather Channel was the #1 weather app by combined iOS App Store and Google Play worldwide downloads from 2016 through 2019 and has over 1.5M 5-star ratings on Google Play and over 800K 5-star ratings the iOS App Store worldwide

summary: Weather Radar, live maps and storm tracker: check your local weather forecast
recentChanges:
We’re constantly working to improve your app experience. In this release:

• Upgrade to Premium! Discover Windstream, a new animated map layer that lets you track wind speed & direction.
• Bug fixes & performance enhancements

We value your feedback! Email us at android.support@weather.com with any questions or suggestions.
comments: Simply poor. I pay monthly for the "premium" version but still get ads, most often the ad to buy the premium service. The on-going notification often turns itself off in the settings but remains in the notification bar so hasn't updated in hours or days. I've written the developer but have received no response. Going to see if this review gets a response and if not I'll be deleting.

Really like this app. Accurate weather, amazing additions such as UV index and the peak times, pollen counts, rain totals. Extended forecasts that you can set daily or hourly and an easy to use radar that you can customize. There are great videos to watch of weather, nature, animal and other things going on around the world.

Almost as good as it was a year ago. And a long standing problem is the radar for past and future move so fast its difficult to know what time each event is happening so l play it over and over trying to guess when the rain will start or stop or when the red part of the storm is over my location, etc.

Excellent app. This has been the best one thus far. I get real time temps, forecasts, advisories, pollen count, etc. Every place I visit, it gives me current weather conditions. And I'm okay with the ads. I also enjoy weather news and news from around the world plus when I travel I get up to the minute foecasts wherever I go. Valuable.

In my experience this app is consistently the most accurate for my daily observation of conditions in my area. Even more so than the local news stations. I'm always confident that I'm getting the best forcast for planning my week. Thank you. I love the hourly breakdown of conditions to include wind speed and precipitation amounts.

title: Weather by WeatherBug: Real Time Forecast & Alerts
description:
Download WeatherBug®, winner of the 2019 “Best Weather App” by Appy Awards.

Get the most accurate weather app that provides environmental intelligence for all aspects of people’s lives, free! This live weather app provides the fastest weather alerts, real-time weather conditions, accurate hourly & 10-day forecasts & more.

Explore 18 weather maps, including Doppler radar, UV index, satellite map, lightning alerts, precipitation, local temperature, wind chill, and more! From heat index to pollen count, WeatherBug gives you everything you need to know. Our weather widgets let you set alerts and information you want to see on your home screen.

Radar weather apps have never been this easy or convenient. Join WeatherBug's millions of users and Know Before® any weather condition. In the market since 2000, WeatherBug gives you and your family reliable weather data, download now!

This app is awesome! Gives me just what I need to know throughout the day and night. - Android User

THE WEATHERBUG ADVANTAGE
• Spark™ Lightning Alerts Get Dangerous Thunderstorm Alerts & prepare for severe weather conditions

WEATHER NEWS FOR YOU

Additional enhancements in the latest version:

Love the app? Rate us!
Thank you for your support!
comments: My entire family has been utilizing this app for years, and I can say with absolute certainty that Weather Bug has been without a doubt the most reliable and accurate app for weather. We use it for most of our drilling rigs and fracking locations where accuracy is of the utmost importance. We use it for personal and/or government trips when safe travel is strictly needed. Thank you WB for being there each and every time we need you!!!

Like the app overall since there is a local station, BUT for the last few updates, the forecast is WRONG. It may say the low is 22, but scroll through the hourly? Low may be 40. It is not just the app, is the same way if pull up the website. Cannot trust a quick glance anymore. Right most of the time, but a lot of difference between I need to leave the water running and cover the plants and 40. Looking at other reviews, I'm not the only one experiencing the issue.

I like the app and it's about as accurate as it could be. Only bug I've seen yet (no big deal) is, if you don't visit the site every once in a while, the temp on your phone stops changing. All I have to do is go to WeatherBug and after I leave the site, my temp fluctuates again like it should. Good app.

Bad. This app consistently keeps losing functions that I like. First it was the radar animation, which used to keep playing, but now if I move the map, clunk! it stops the animation. Same with zoom in or out. It USED TO work but they took it away and never brought it back. Then, it was the status bar temperature, which USED TO display but now refuses to. I've now switched to Weather & Radar USA, which has BOTH functions working that ceased to work in Weatherbug. Kinda sad to leave WB, but have 2

I'd like it more if it had wind speed next to/under the temp. It's more important here, but I shouldn't have to go looking for it. (And yes, I've customized it, and it's still "below the fold"as it were.) Update 200310: looks like they read my above comment, bc I can now see it on the first page and don't have to go look for it, yay!

title: AccuWeather: Weather forecast news & live radar
description:
Get live weather forecasts, accurate storm alerts and weather news with AccuWeather - superior accuracy™ you can rely on.

Accurate weather forecasts, real-time alerts, and severe weather warnings are available on-demand. Get today’s weather forecast, storm alerts, live storm radar and much more!

Get ready for the season with AccuWeather’s weather alerts that are superior in their accuracy. Be prepared with the daily forecast or sudden severe changes in weather with live alerts and accurate weather forecasts. So whether there’s wind, rain, or even a hurricane - you can stay one step ahead with AccuWeather’s weather radar.

Accurate weather forecasts - 5 reasons why you’ll love using AccuWeather:
1. Accurate weather forecasts whenever and wherever you need them - AccuWeather’s superior accuracy™ won’t let you down.
2. Severe weather warnings that keep you safe - From storms to high wind, be prepared for any severe weather event on the horizon with real-time weather warnings and storm alerts.
3. Today’s temperature in detail - RealFeel Temperature® technology tells you the difference between how the weather looks and how it actually feels.
4. Weather updates wherever you are - Get local forecasts when you’re at home or worldwide weather updates when you’re on vacation.
5. Live weather 24/7 - Check up to 15 days in advance or check out our weather radar for accurate weather forecasts every minute!

Local forecasts, today’s temperature and more! Live weather stats give you real-time weather updates. From storm alerts to heavy rain, get all the severe weather warnings you need to protect you against any wind, rain or severe weather alert on the horizon.

Go beyond today's weather forecast. From the daily forecast to snowstorm weather warnings, you control what type of information you get. Whether you want today’s weather or today’s temperature, AccuWeather is weather forecasting with a difference!

The daily forecast, severe weather warnings, storm alerts and more! Features that will help the AccuWeather app work for you:

• Local forecasts that you can personalize, depending on where you are in the world.
• Today's weather forecast and beyond. Look 15 days ahead to ensure that you’re prepared for any rain or severe weather alerts with AccuWeather’s weather radar technology.
• Live weather, minute by minute! Try the MinuteCast® weather tracker for the most up to date weather alerts.
• Weather forecasting is brought to life with trending videos from AccuWeather’s news team.
• Daily forecast updates filtered according to your preferences. Hide any weather alerts that aren’t right for you.

Weather updates you can rely on. AccuWeather’s weather tracker makes it easy to plan a weekend outdoors without battling the wind or getting caught in the rain. 

With AccuWeather’s superior accuracy™ for local forecasts, you’ll never miss a memorable moment. Wherever you are or wherever you’re going, get reliable weather forecasting with AccuWeather - your personal weather radar.

Today’s weather forecast is in the palm of your hand. AccuWeather helps you prepare for today’s temperature with its state of the art weather tracker technology. Get ready for wind or sun with the most accurate source of the weather forecast. 

Download AccuWeather today for free and enjoy award-winning superior accuracy™ in weather forecasting on your Android device.

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: This has long been one of my favorite apps, but the latest (March 15 2020) version is awful. Lost all my settings, MinuteCast no longer works (just a white dots showing), disabling weather in title bar doesn't work, and no longer report for current location. Adding insult to injury, the ads are now super-intrusive. I've uninstalled on two devices. So did my spouse. I'll try it again in a week or two, unless I find something else that's satisfactory.

It is ridiculous how inaccurate this app is.....not sure where it originates from but it needs to be evaluated for accuracy. Sun shining brightly and it reports it is raining.....and vice versa. Am going to look for another app which at the worst, has some accuracy. This one came on my phone and will,be installing. On the positive side, it does provide us with many laughs.

Loved this app until recently. I do not like ads, at all, so I paid for the ad-free version years ago. I also have a network-level adblocker (pi-hole) . In the last 2 weeks the app has stopped working unless I disable my adblocker or whitelist a ton of advertising and user-tracking domains. Why? I paid for the ad-free version, it should be FREE OF ADS.

I've had this app for years and I have had some of my friends download it,it's the Best,and most reliable.I've never had any problems with it,extremely simple one click open,from 'Home Screen,' that you have the option of in settings and also which I want to know is what's the weather conditions and temperature when I go outside my door and this app can also pinpoint your gps location,so there's no guessing,you'll know.And also,which is extremely important to me,you can recieve important Alerts!

Best weather app I've used, and I've used all of them! Love everything about the app, and think the apps layout is extremely nice too. Accuracy is the best of any weather app I've used, and the radar is probably the best I've seen as well. App isn't without flaws though, which is why it's a 4 star review instead of 5. Minutcast always loses my location for whatever reason, so I always have to manually key it in. Minutecast doesn't update as frequently as it did before either.

recentChanges:
Optimize service
Fix bugs and display issues
comments: I've been dealing with the weather channel for years now. I didnt think there was anything better. I installed this app and was blown away with how accurate it was compared to WC. This app gave me the same temp as my car did. The WC said 2° below. Not that 2° is a big deal, but if its wrong on that. What else are they wrong with? Everything!!!! You can also pay a flat fee for app for only 2.99 (which I did), not the new (by year) thing. So far I cant find anything I don't like. BIG THANKS TO DEV

I enjoy the look of this app, how detailed the information is, and many of the customization options in terms of units and skins. There are a few things which would suit my needs better though. I travel between a set of 4 towns regularly. It would be nice if the widget held more than just the current city and could be changed between saved cities by swiping up/down on the widget interface. My previous app did this and I found it tremendously useful. Also my "current" city is often incorrect.

My original review was 1 star due to the app not allowing me to search for, and save, the small towns I travel to so I can see weather ahead of time. The problem has since been very rapidly fixed and I appreciate that greatly! There were some language barriers with customer service, but they replied very rapidly and my issue was eventually communicated! I love this app! It is neatly organized, easy to understand, and the ads are not obnoxious! Recommended 👍

It is really too soon for me to give the app 5 stars as I just installed it. However, it is showing the forecast quite nicely as other apps that I have been using don't or have quit doing so. Plus, if the main critical reviews are about celcius/Fahrenheit and military/civilian times, then I believe this is probably going to be a good weather app.

The app itself is sensational. Lots of different information to help me see what's going to be happening throughout the day. My biggest issue is with the widgets. If the clock updates itself, then why does my weather not update until I tap the widget and open it? What good is this widget if it won't update itself?

comments: If you have more than one Google account, and you paid for ad free, they will make sure to use the account you didn't pay ad free for, as a reason to show ads unless you pay for every account. There's no way to put it under the main account you use. I paid twice, and I still have ads, because they managed to then move it to another account not paid for. So don't waste your money if you have multiple accounts.

Well I didn't think you could make a weather app worse then the last update but you succeed. That TV tab is ridicules, Please I beg you give an opinion to disable the coronavirus and TV tabs. Coronavirus is news not weather and I pay for no advertising. Many people have had enough hearing about this and don't need it staring you in the face everytime you want to see the weather forecast. Option to remove please and soon. At the very least allow users to move it to the bottom of the screen.

3/19/20 Update: THANK you for bringing back the temperature notification! Back to 5 stars. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 3/17/20 Update: the new version removed one of my favorite features. The notification bar icon used to show the 2 digit outside temperature, but now it shows a weather condition icon (cloud, sun, etc.). This is terrible. Please, either make that icon customizable, or return it to the temperature! My favorite weather app. Been using it for 2 years. Love the widget.

This app used to be great, but since the new web design the app has not worked. It is now useless. Since thenew web design went into effect my local temperature shows to be a constant 70° F , 24 hours a day, which in truth is not. JUST ADDED 3/17/2020 I did send an email to the support team the same day I wrote this post.

Great app. Very accurate weather. One critique would be on the Daily Weather icons, if rain is expected AT ALL during the 24 hour time frame of that day, the icon for that day shows up as the cloud/rain icon. The hourly could show sunshine all day from 6am to 8pm, but if it's going to rain from 8pm to Midnight, the Icon for the entire day on the daily forecast will show Rain. Wish they could do split icons. Sun/Rain, for AM sun, afternoon rain or vice versa.

title: MyRadar Weather Radar
description:
MyRadar is a fast, easy-to-use, yet powerful weather app that displays animated weather radar around your current location, allowing you to quickly see what weather is coming your way. Just start the app, and your location pops up with animated live radar, with radar loop lengths of up to two hours.  This basic functionality provides the quickest way to get a fast snapshot of the weather on-the-go, and it's what has made MyRadar so successful over the years.  Check your phone and get an instant assessment of the weather that will impact your day.

In addition to the live radar, MyRadar has an ever-increasing list of weather and environmentally-related data layers that you can overlay on top of the map;  our animated winds layer shows a breathtaking visual representation of both surface winds and winds at the jetstream level; the frontal boundaries layer shows high and low pressure systems as well as frontal boundaries themselves; the earthquakes layer is a great way to stay on top of the latest reports on seismic activity, completely customizable as to severity and time; our hurricane layer allows users to stay on top of the latest tropical storm and hurricane activity throughout the world; the aviation layer overlays AIRMETs, SIGMETs and other aviation-related data, including the ability to track flights and display their IFR flight plans and paths, and the "wildfires" layer allows users to stay abreast of the latest fire activity around the United States.

In addition to the data layers, MyRadar has the ability to send weather and environmental alerts, including alerts from the National Weather Center, such as Tornado and Severe Weather alerts.  A new feature introduced in this version of MyRadar includes the ability to receive alerts based off of Tropical  Storm and Hurricane activity;  you can configure the app to send you an alert any time a tropical storm or hurricane forms, or is upgraded or downgraded.

One of the most useful features in MyRadar is the ability to provide advanced rain alerts;  our patent-pending process for predicting hyper-local rainfall is the most accurate in the industry.  Instead of having to check the app all the time, MyRadar will send you an alert up to an hour in advance as to when the rain will arrive at your current location, down to the minute, including details on intensity and duration.  These alerts can be a life saver when you're on-the-go and don't always have time to check the weather - our systems will proactively do the work for you and let you know in advance before the rain hits.

All of the weather and environmental data represented on MyRadar is displayed on our custom mapping system, developed in-house.  This mapping system uses your devices GPU, which makes it incredibly fast and speedy.  When you're looking for quick weather information on-the-go, that makes a huge difference.  The map has the standard pinch/zoom capability which allows you to smoothly zoom and pan around the United States and the rest of the world to see what the weather is like anywhere on the planet.

In addition to the free features of the app, a few additional upgrades are available, including real-time hurricane tracking - great for the start of hurricane season.  The hurricane tracker provides additional data above and beyond the free version, including the cone of probability for tropical storm/hurricane forecast tracks, and it also includes a detailed synopsis from the National Hurricane Center.  The premium upgrades also include the professional radar pack, which allows greater detail of radar from individual stations.  Users can select individual radar stations around the US, select the radar tilt angle, and also change the radar product being displayed, including base reflectivity and wind velocity - great for experienced weather buffs looks to stay on top of possible tornado formation.

Don't get caught off guard with bad weather;  download MyRadar today and try it out!

summary: Real-time weather radar with temperatures, warnings, hurricanes and widgets
recentChanges:
- New app icon and fresh look and feel!
- Corrected an issue that caused a large blank notification to show up on some Pixel devices.
- Improved GPS positioning when app is active, as some users weren't getting precise locations.
- Fixed a crash on startup when launching directly from the Play Store.
- Gray map will now attempt to show labels in your chosen language.
comments: Wow - - I have no idea what you all did to the app but WHOA - I can't set a single thing. The radar maps moves faster than the speed of light. My local is messed up AND I lost everything that has to do with Hawai'i. I can´t seem to be able to reset anything. I'm a stormspotter and can't use this anymore. DAMN! I'm sure you know the phrase - if it's not broke, don't fix it. Well, it wasn't broke. I'm a thinkin T'm gonna uninstall it! Sorry, it only gets 1 star and I'm being nice. HELP!!

I love this app. It has been fairly accurate . I use it all the time tracking snow storms in winter. As an otr truck driver the wind and weather paterns are important. I guess i been useing it over 2 years now. This updated version is working smoothly and looks good. Developers , you guys an gals have done a great job . Sorry i haven't left yall a review sooner.

free version is very good, paid version is great. I like how i can turn on things like wind layers, earthquakes, high resolution maps, temperature overlays. One thing i wish was an option with the temperature layer is that it could be in vector form or topological instead of data bubbles.. other than that, pretty impressive powerful app with lots of options

It is absolutely great!!! When Google weather tries to start sending "stuff," I disable it. I checked out The National Weather Service app, it's so archaic. MyRadar is so neat! You can zoom in and out, move it to someplace else you want to see what the weather is doing or check out what the weather is doing where a relative or friend lives or is visiting. There are so many different informational choices to turn on or off and types of information or screens to switch to. An info packed app!!!

MyRadar is exactly what it says it is. A radar that is exceotional. It is very easy to personalize and use. Besides precipitation it will also show the wind direction and speed, making it very easy to pinpoint fronts. Absolutely no intrusive ads. Your location and favorites weather and forecasts are updated every few minutes. As you maneuver around the map wherever you stop will show the name and weather for that area. This is anywhere in the world. Very simply the best radar and weather app

title: Weather & Widget - Weawow
description:
Weawow is a beautiful and highly accurate weather forecast application.
You can also sell your photos at the Weawow marketplace.



Accurate and detailed weather forecast for free
- Free without advertisement: No annoying advertisements are displayed at all.
- Beautiful photos and weather forecast: The beautiful photos posted by users are matched with the weather forecast and displayed, so you can see the weather conditions from the photographs.
- Corresponding weather forecast: live weather, today weather, tomorrow weather, 48 hour weather, weekly weather.
- Accurate and detailed weather: highest temperature, lowest temperature, live temperature, apparent (feels-like) temperature, probability of rain, precipitation, humidity, dew point, clouds cover, atmospheric pressure, wind speed, wind direction, UV index, visibility, air Quality, pollen.
- Covers worldwide: Countries, cities, spots, places, and local that can be searched using Google search.
- Supported languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Chinese, and 50 more languages.
- Animated radar map: rainy situation, temperature, cloud movement, wind movement, atmospheric pressure, waves, ocean current. All of these information can be seen up to 10 days ahead.
- Sun and Moon: Sunrise time, sunset time, twilight, moon phases, full moon day, new moon day, age of the moon.
- Bookmark: Manage your favorite places with bookmarks.
- Simple interface: You can get the necessary information by simply scrolling down the screen.
- Choose your favorite theme: Dark theme and white theme are available.



Beautiful widgets
- Weather forecast widget with pictures: Enjoy a richer home screen with beautiful pictures and weather forecast.
- Around 10 types of widget: Sizes range from 1x1 to 4x4. Changeable font size, background transparency, color, place, local time.
- Real time update: Automatically get the latest weather forecast.
- GPS support: Even if you move to another local, you will automatically get the weather information for that local.
- Clock, date: Supports local time. Launches calendar application and clock application.



Daily notification and On-going notification
- Push notification: Notifies the weather forecast for that day at the specified time.
- On-going notification: weather information up to 8 hours ahead, weekly weather, current weather.
- Weather on the status bar: Current temperature, today's highest temperature, today's lowest temperature, weather type.



Covers worldwide, in all cities
- Examples of supported countries: United State (US), Canada, Mexico, United Kingdom (UK), Spain, France, Germany, Russia, Turkey, India, China, Japan, Argentina, Brazil, and all other countries.
- Examples of supported cities: Washington DC, Chicago, New York, Hawaii, Boston, Houston, Denver, Atlanta, Pittsburgh, St Louis, Cleveland, London, Madrid, Paris, Stockholm, Rome, Berlin, Athens, Prague, Warsaw, Kyiv, Moscow, Ankara, New Delhi, Tokyo, Buenos Aires, and all other cities and local.



Posting and selling your photos
- You can post and sell your photos from Weawow's browser service.
- The posted photos are automatically displayed after being matched with the weather in the application as well.
https://weawow.com/marketplace



Weather information provider: Dark Sky, Weatherbit, MET (Yr), WWO, AccuWeather, WAQI

https://weawow.com/marketplace



Weather information provider: Dark Sky, Weatherbit, MET (Yr), WWO, AccuWeather, WAQI
summary: Free, and there is no advertisement at all.
recentChanges: Fixed a bug that the app would hang if the weather location is in Kuala Lumpur.
comments: I don't usually write reviews, but this app does everything I need it to - WITHOUT ADS ! Weather by hourly intervals, temperature and felt like temperature, wind speed, air quality... There is even a widget thank God. I am very very very happy with this app and will recommend 100% to all of my friends. I will try and support the developers by sending some coffee money.

A well designed weather app: clean, functional, accurate, and with live + future radar in UK and Europe. Great that you can choose from different weather providers. The developer clearly loves what they're doing and the result is an awesome app. They even did this with zero ads and that alone is a big win, deserving of support. I'm looking forward to how this app continues in development and if there's one thing I would like to see added, it would be weather alerts. Thank you, 5 stars!

I am happy to say that this app has replaced WU after IBM screwed it up. This is the best replacement to date. Great layout of info with the exception of the large image that loads at startup. I would like an option to disable that photo and jump right into the meat and potatoes. You've got a good app here; careful not to screw it up like others in this industry! Great work!

Everything looks great, but I hate 12-hour clock. The widget itself displays 24-hour time, but everything in the window it opens is 12-hour. Edit: changing to 5 stars then. But you may want to make this setting have the default value derived from system settings. As it was different in different places, I never thought it was configurable, looked hardwired to me.

I just installed this and so far it looks like the best weather app out of the 10 or so I have tried. It even lets you choose from five different weather provider sources! Clean layout, small app footprint, well-designed. The only thing I would like to see is the ability to save different Geographic locations. As it is now every time I want to see a forecast for another state or region I have to search for it.

title: Weather Underground: Local Weather Maps & Forecast
description:
Weather, at a microclimate level. Discover a truly accurate forecast, with real-time and hyper-local weather news and updates. With weather data from over 250,000 personal weather stations and a proprietary forecast model, Weather Underground gives you the most precise weather forecast at a hyper-local level. Find out about current conditions, interactive Nexrad radar, and get customizable weather alerts from NOAA and much more, thanks to our Nexrad radar and Doppler radar technology. You’ll always be prepared for whatever the weather brings.

5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD WEATHER UNDERGROUND

• Local weather conditions: get current weather conditions from your local, personal weather station, as well as hourly/daily summary forecasts up to 10 days in the future, which include chance of precipitation and precise weather summaries.
• Most detailed local weather data: get updates with the best weather data including weather maps, local Doppler radar imagery, temperature updates, “Feels Like,” wind speed, wind directions, today’s rain accumulation, humidity, dew point, visibility, and pressure.
• Weather alerts: set NOAA weather alerts for your exact position and trust our storm radar for severe weather updates - you'll always be prepared for your microclimate, rain or shine!
• Other geographical data: discover more information and get news about your microclimate with our air quality index, UV index, local flu outbreaks, sunrise & sunset and moonrise & moonset times at local personal weather stations.
• Customized experience: set your app with light & dark modes and various map types and units.


DISCOVER THE UNIQUE FEATURES OF WEATHER UNDERGROUND

Interactive weather maps with Nexrad radar technology & severe weather alerts:

• The most interactive weather maps on mobile allow you to select from different precise weather overlays, personal weather stations, Nexrad radar, NOAA and satellite imagery, heat maps, and rain accumulation. 
• Sophisticated weather visualizations with hi-res satellite & cloud cover imagery from GOES-16, powered by data from NOAA.
• Keep an eye out for extreme weather and always be prepared with severe weather alerts.

Accurate hyper-local forecasts:

• Over 250,000 personal weather stations report the most accurate local weather conditions. Visualize precise weather radar imagery for your very own microclimate.
• Made to fill in the gaps between the airport weather stations that other weather services rely upon to generate forecasts - meaning our data is generated from actual data points in your neighborhood.

Subscribe to Premium!

• Upgrade and remove all ads from your weather app by purchasing an annual subscription.
• Access Smart Forecasts: set your ideal weather conditions for your outdoor activities and we’ll tell you when to go.
• View Extended Hourly Forecasts up to 15 days in the future.

You can cancel your Weather Underground subscription anytime through your iTunes account settings, or it will automatically renew. This must be done 24 hours before the end of any subscription period to avoid being charged another fee. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase and upon commencement of each renewal term. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

-----

Privacy & Feedback
• Our Privacy Policy can be viewed here: https://www.wunderground.com/company/privacy-policy
• Our Terms of Use can be viewed here: https://www.wunderground.com/company/legal 
• If you have any questions or suggestions about our weather service, please do not hesitate to get in touch at support@wunderground.com.

developerAddress:
550 Kearny Street, Suite 600
San Francisco, CA 94108
recentChanges:
Included in v6.4.1:

- Fix to ensure are ads are removed for premium users

Please send us any feedback you have at support@wunderground.com. We plan to update our app every other week so keep an eye out for more features very soon.

Thank you!

comments: IBM has broken what didn't need to be fixed. After 7 years I'll be uninstalling and finding something new. My favorite aspect was the Summary. Now it's hidden and a few clicks to get to it. No, it doesn't have a cleaner interface at all. The graphics are Chunky and squished together making it hard to read. It used to be that the daily weather was spread out and looked nice. I guess IBM (the new owner) had to squeeze in more room for ad revenue. Edited to add: Now it keeps crashing. Yayy!

Update as of 3/14 recognizes that I'm a paying subscriber and has removed the ads that should never have been there in the first place. I remain wary of how future updates will be handled. This was such a great app before the redesign, but it feels like every step forward since then has been two steps back in some other part of the app. I appreciate the quick response from the devs, it's honestly all that kept me from moving on to another app. Here's to second chances...

This new version is not better. The radar now a little better. I would like to customize everything I see and look at. I don't care about the pollin count and would like to eliminate it. My biggest issue is I want weather from AIRPORTS and not some unknown weather station managed by a "bunch of college students". Even though I paid for it, I will not use it. Why do people insist on fixing something that's not broke in the first place?

Been using this app for years and years - some bugs along the way, but mostly a great experience. The latest UI change basically gimps the whole thing with more ads and the removal of the Smart Forecast feature which I used regularly. $4/mo for 'premium'? Every other app I've used has a small one-time fee that I would have gladly paid. And it still has that ridiculous 5-second splash screen... I'm done.

I do like the app, BUT, when I had first downloaded it on my tablet / glorified alarm clock, 3yrs ago the smart forecast feature was free, I downloaded it to my phone to be able to use said feature and now it costs, I'm NOT going to spend money on a feature that was ONCE FREE.! The developer sold out, you already get Ad revenue from the ads you have in the app, which I presume will still be there after buying a subscription. #sellout

title: Dark Sky - Hyperlocal Weather
description:
Dark Sky is the most accurate source of hyperlocal weather information. With down-to-the-minute forecasts, you’ll know exactly when the rain will start or stop, right where you're standing. (It's like magic.) 

Featured in: New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fast Company, Wired, and more.

DARK SKY FREE
The app is free to download and includes a full 24-hour forecast, a detailed 7-day forecast, current conditions, multiple saved locations, historical data, and beautiful weather maps.

DARK SKY PREMIUM
Sign up for a two-week free trial to explore all of the premium features below! If you love it as much as we think you will, it’s only $2.99 / year thereafter (that’s 25 cents a month -- barely the cost of a gumball, and way tastier!).

· Down-to-the-minute Forecasts ·
Down-to-the-minute forecasts tell you exactly when the rain will start or stop, right where you're standing. 

· Rain Notifications and Alerts ·
Rain Notifications​, ​Severe Weather Alerts​, and ​Custom Alerts​ keep you on top of ever-changing weather conditions, without having to open the app.

· Temperature in Status Bar ·
Convenient persistent notification displays the current temperature in your phone’s status bar, and you can swipe down for the full forecast.

· Widgets ·
​Widgets​ show you the weather right on your homescreen: Current conditions, next hour rain forecasts, a daily summary, and a look at the week ahead.

· Wear OS ·
The watch app gives you the full set of Dark Sky capabilities, including current conditions, forecasts for the next 24 hours and next 7 days, and our hyperlocal down-to-the-minute rain forecasts.

Dark Sky is currently available in the US, UK, Ireland, and Puerto Rico.

summary: Dark Sky tells you exactly when it will rain (or snow) up to an hour in advance.
recentChanges:
Version 3.3
- Add support for pressure custom notifications; get a notification if pressure is forecasted to change by your specified amount during the next 24 hours
- More descriptive error messages when using Time Machine
- Small tweaks & bug fixes
comments: Really a GREAT app but to use the widgets (or the hyperlocal stuff) you have to buy the premium which is only 3 bucks but that's not the point. I've got at least 4 other weather apps that I can utilize all of the functions on if I don't mind ads. Pay to have temp on the status bar? Please. I don't think so. The radar is fantastic and the interface is pleasant to look at & if you want to use it, it's pretty great. It just doesn't have the features every other app has for free.

I've tried NOAA and Ventusky before Dark Sky and its by far the most accurate, best looking, and with far fewer bugs. I had an issue with my premium subscription and their customer service was very quick to provide me with a solution that fixed my issue. Couldn't be happier with it, I recommend it to friends and co-workers frequently.

Wow so far this app is amazing! I've been looking for something new since Wunderground destroyed their app at the beginning of the year. I'm not one who usually subscribes to premium but on this one I'm going to give it a try. My only suggestion to the developers is please let me change the barometer from millibar (MB) to inches of mercury (inHg).

Great weather app. I used the Weather Underground app for years until the recent horrible "upgrade" ruined it. After trying many alternatives I settled on Dark Sky. It doesn't have the wonderful informative and customizable graph that I miss in WU, but it does seem to be very accurate and is easy and intuitive to use. I wish I customize the interface a bit to better reflect my preferences.

Agree with others, the Android only subscription is BS. The upcoming weather and Todays weather don't match. Recently the hyper local weather (your bread and butter) has been incorrect. More widgets...if I'm paying for them please make them. A hyper local widget with the next 15 min - 3 hrs would be great, or a daily graph, or both! Longer forecast is often wrong.

title: Yahoo Weather
description:
The forecast is beautiful. 

Prepare for your day with the most accurate hourly, 5-day, and 10-day forecasts. Stunning Flickr photos match your location, time of day, and current conditions.

Favorite features
- Get all the details: wind, pressure, and chance of precipitation.
- See animated sunrise, sunset, wind, and pressure modules.
- Browse interactive maps: radar, satellite, heat, and snow.
- Track all your favorite cities and destinations!
- Accessibility: Enabled for TalkBack. Optimized for color contrast. 

Helpful tips
- Scroll down for detailed weather information.
- Tap the plus sign to add up to 20 cities.
- Swipe left-to-right to move between locations.
- Submit your photos to Yahoo Weather by joining #projectweather on Flickr.

Tell us what you think
We are committed to building the best mobile experiences and would love to hear your feedback.

Let us know your thoughts here: weather-app-support@yahoo-inc.com

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: This one is the best weather app of all the ones I've tried, mainly because it's interface is pretty clean and mostly provides the accurate weather (and instantly updates it).

It's ok I'm looking for an app that shows real time radar in motion and doesn't sell my information. Last one I installed I got 10 email advertising before I figured out the app. I just want to see the weather
I like app, but loses digits when in even temperature. Needs work. Needs lot more work. Still doing same single digits weather. Yahoo get in toghter.
It tells you most weather, sometimes lies. It is like the news.You could know weather from anywhere on earth and have a map on it.It could be better at tornados and rain and snow.
My favorite weather app. I've used others but this one is always my go to. It's simple, easy to use and the pictures of the cities are beautiful and change often.

title: Weather Forecast - Live Weather & Radar & Widgets
description:
Best weather forecast, accurate position your. 
Application 100% FREE

The weather provides current detailed current weather forecasts and weather forecast observations from all over the world. The weather forecast also provides current atmospheric pressure, weather online conditions, visibility distance, relative humidity, different unit precipitation, dew point, wind speed and direction, and ten days ahead. Daily and hourly weather forecasts. Real-time weather forecasts give you accurate weather information no matter where you are!

——Features——

☀️Realtime local temperature checker & live local weather:
Detailed real-time weather reports, including real-time weather conditions and temperatures, “feeling” temperatures, precipitation, UV index, humidity, visibility, pressure, pollen count, sunrise and sunset times.

☁️Hourly/Daily Forecast:
Detailed weather forecasts, including weather conditions, maximum/minimum temperatures, precipitation, wind, etc. You can check all of this data every day or even every hour.

☔️Precipitation Forecast:
Tell you to bring an umbrella with you before it rains.

🌂Severe weather alerts:
Inform you the real-time weather alerts and warnings. 

🌈Weather & Clock Widgets:
Easily check the current & future weather info via widgets in 2*1, 4*1, 4*2, 5*1, 5*2 sizes. In the meantime, all weather widgets can switch between different themes.

⚡️Customize Your weather channel:
- Local Conditions: Access to local weather conditions, weather map & weather radar
- Temperature Units: Fahrenheit (°F), Celsius (°C)
- Wind Units: MPH, KPH, Knots and MPS
- Pressure Units: Inches and millibars

❄️ Multiple Language Support:

developerAddress: Beihai New District, Youth City Park，Xian Province
comments: I dropped my weather app because it wouldn't load anymore. So far I have had no issues with Wx Forecast app. I really like the graphic layout and being able to tailor it to my needs.

Continuing to like this weather app. As accurate as can be (compared to others). I like the options to change background covers and the ability to change how precipitation and other weather related choices are. Overall best weather app I've used yet.

This weather app has been on point with the true weather and I'm In Ok where the weather changes moods all too often. I've had absolutely no problem opening this app which is a huge plus compared to the weather channel app I was using had problems with it daily!
Very clear and concise, with the option to cancel the ads at a very small cost. If the ads don't bother you, keep it as it downloads, the best weather app I've used 😍
So far the app works great.. it's so much better than the one they had programed on the phone already.. I love how descriptive even on the extended weather and the hourly.

title: NOAA Weather Unofficial
description:
This weather app is not affiliated with NOAA or the National Weather Service. Products provided by NOAA are in the public domain, and this app's use of those products is compliant with NOAA/NWS terms of use.


This app provides forecasts, animated radar, hourly forecast, and current conditions, all in an intuitive and easy to use interface. Just the information you need, provided accurately, quickly, and for your exact location.


★ "A no-nonsense approach to show weather data on your phone, but done well and great looking" - Android Central


This app uses NOAA point forecasts from your GPS location to get the most localized weather available. Point forecasts are great for climbing, hiking, skiing, or any outdoor activity where weather from a nearby city isn't accurate enough.


GPS on the phone will provide the most accurate location, but usually isn't needed. Nearby cell towers and Wi-Fi networks can also provide this information, and will be checked first to save time and battery.  You can also enter a location manually.


To provided highly localized forecasting, this app uses point forecasts from the National Weather Service (NOAA/NWS), and is therefore only available in the US.


If there is severe weather this will display at the top of the forecast. This app currently does NOT support severe weather alerts or notifications. NOAA is providing this service directly through cell carriers. You can read more about the service at https://www.weather.gov/wrn/wea.


There are also several differently sized widgets available which can be placed on your homescreen to provide some basic weather information, without the need to open the app.


Forecast discussion is available through the menu button.


Permission: Location
This app requires your location to provide you with the most accurate weather. This is fundamental to how the app works. You can still add manual locations as well if you prefer.


Permission: Photos/Media/Files
This permission is required by Google Maps so that it can cache map tiles for faster loading. It sounds like the app is doing something with your photos or media, but it is not. The permission means that the app has permission to access your files (which includes photos and media), but does not mean they are actually being accessed. It is a subtle but important distinction. Contact me if you have further questions about this.


These are the non-simplified permissions as listed in the Android manifest:
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" (location access listed above)
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" (check for network connection)
android.permission.INTERNET" (download weather)
android.permission.VIBRATE" (for zoom feedback on old radar)
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" (this is Photos/Media/Files listed above)
com.google.android.providers.gsf.permission.READ_GSERVICES" (required by google maps)


FAQ (Frequently asked questions):
http://www.graniteapps.net/noaaweather/faq.html


Please contact me if you have any further questions or problems.


This is the ad supported free version of NOAA Weather. You are also limited to 3 saved locations. Upgrade to remove ads and this restriction.


NOAA Weather on Twitter
https://twitter.com/noaa_weather

Beta Channel (for newest features)
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.nstudio.weatherhere.free

summary: NOAA forecast & radar for your exact location.
recentChanges:
v2.10.2
* Fixed a few minor bugs.

v2.10.1
* Added lightning strike density image type to maps.
* Moved map hazard layer to behind other images and set default opacity from 80% to 50%. Configurable in tab options.
* Daylight savings time bug fix.

v2.10.0
* Changed "Radar" tab to "Maps" to better describe the content and added lots of new imagery from NOAA nowCOAST.
Look in the tab options for new image types, layers, and other overlays including hazardous weather.
comments: I live less than 5 miles from the reporting site. It is great to have instant weather info. No more gadgets at my window with a wire hanging out my window and the mess every time you open the window. When I am away I can get. Instant weather back home so that I know what kind of weather I will be driving into what could be any better? Nothing for me!

gives me my local weather, 7 days in advance. tells temp., wind, precipitation, can expand the day to get the full 24 hours for that day. love the radar to see if rain or snow is coming how far away it is to know when it hits my area. NOAA weather is accurate, complete, and fun to use also. Always right if you follow the info u will see

Good data representation. Hourly graph allows a quick, "in one glance" evaluation of what's to come. I would give it 5 stars but for one problem - labeling of the day. It's not easy to understand the boundaries of the days when you zoom & scroll. The movable day bar at the bottom and the dark blue/lighter blue stripes (they could be improved too) are only partially helpful. I suggest it would be easier to read the graph, if the horizontal axis retained the day label at all zoom levels.

Everything is right there on the page . No scrolling down the page through endless ads trying to find information. The tabs on the top give you all the extra information I'm looking for. Click on the days weather and it expands for more information. Finally a weather app that gives you the weather. If I want videos I'll go to YouTube. Thanks NOAA for a great app!!

This app gives you the real-time NOAA updates and alerts. The radar is accurate and the hourly forecast is customizable. Also, you can choose where you want a forecast from on a map, so if you live in the middle of nowhere you can still receive an accurate detailed forecast. You can only harbor up to 3 locations, but for me that's plenty because you can delete past locations if need be. I would reccomend this app for anybody who is a weather nut, a meteorologist, or a storm chaser.

title: Weather Forecast
description:
100% FREE!!!  

What the weather forecast today? What the weather tomorrow? What the New York weather? or local weather? Even or the national weather and the world weather? What 10 day forecast?... The accurate weather app can provide you a detailed weather forecast wherever you are! 

Use Vegoo weather forecast, you will see weather information update hourly and accurately.

------Main Features------

☀️ Weather live: 
      Use hourly weather app to track the weather condition now.
      Live weather report can provide you hourly weather forecast, daily weather forecast, weekly weather report(7 day weather forecast), monthly weather report, 10 day weather report...

☀️ Accurate Weather Forecast:
      Weather app is updated minute-by-minute. The weather forecast has an accurate weather report. It offers daily weather, hourly weather and monthly weather forecast.

☀️ Excellent Weather Widget & Clock:
      Various weather widgets with current temperature, real-time weather, weather forecast, city, clock & calendar of current location.

☀️ Animated Weather Radar Maps:
      Track local weather conditions with the latest weather radar maps. View real time weather maps & weather radar animations with your personal blizzard & hurricane tracker.
      You can use local weather radar, live weather radar, US weather radar with the radar weather map feature.

☀️ Deep Weather Details:
      Current weather conditions include temperature, atmospheric pressure, feels like, wind speed & direction, relative humidity, visibility distance,UV index readings.

☀️ Severe Weather Alert:
      Stay out of the storm with pushed severe weather alerts with the weather.

☀️ Current Location:
      The weather and climate app detects weather forecast in your current location automatically.
      Detect your current location by network and GPS.

☀️ Multiple Weather Locations:
      The free weather app provides national weather service.You can track the weather report of any city of the world, and slide screen to see the detailed weather information of your city. You can track all your favorite cities and destinations.

☀️ Current Weather Notification
      You can turn on the weather notification feature to get real time weather today or weather tomorrow.

☀️ Sunrise & Sunset Time

☀️ Customize your weather app
- Local Conditions: Access to local weather conditions, weather map & weather radar
- Multi-language Support: Get your weather in English, Spanish & Portuguese …
- Temperature Units: Fahrenheit (°F), Celsius (°C)
- Wind Units: MPH, KPH, Knots and MPS
- Pressure Units: Inches and millibars


What makes the weather app different?

✨ Excellent Design
✨ Various types of Weather Widget

If there's any suggestion with the weather app, please contact Vegoo Weather Forecast:
Email: cghxstudio@gmail.com

Fix Bugs

comments: ***Update*** I gave 5 stars before because it's a very nice app. It worked well back then. Now it has started to fail. I can't get a weather updated because the app widget doesn't update temperature and conditions unless I go to the app and update it myself. But when I go to the app it keeps crashing and don't let me see the actual conditions outside. I guess the developer went to jail or just became lazy and don't want to update the app. Oh well, too bad for them. I'm getting another one.

All looks awesome. One problem, the weather in the notifications never changes to what the weather really is. It showed 42 degrees when it was 24 degrees ...huge difference. This needs fixed asap. Signed a paid customer EDIT: WISH I could get my money back. No response at all and no fix. Uninstalled, useless and dropping to 1 star.

The first impressions of the application are the most pleasant. But..., the widget really does not update the temperature and weather conditions. You have to go into the application and then the info on the widget updates. We will not see ads, if it does this itself. After all, advertising is only in the full version of the program. Presumably if you pay for the Pro version (it is without ads), the widget will update the weather information.

Finally an app that tells the truth. All the other app's comes with ads and viruses. Always with something more then what you want. (or less). This App and "Weather Bug" are side by side. "Thank you" now I can rest easy. 🌪 let the rains come, I'm ready now; or sun shine. ✌🌝👍 Yes!

The widget would be good if it updated itself instead of waiting for the user to open the full app. Not useful as a widget as is. Decent accuracy for the forecasts. Nice amount and variety of information provided. Radar image is small, a long way down the list of information modules (which can't be adjusted in the preferences), and must be clicked open once you've scrolled down to it in order to see the information it can provide.

title: What The Forecast?!!
description:
What The Forecast?!! Awards and Mentions:

What The Forecast?!! won a 2018 People's Choice Webby Award in the category of Mobile Sites & Apps - Services & Utilities!!  Thank you to everyone who voted and helped make that happen!!

Listed in Google Play's "Best of 2017" as one of the top 5 new apps!!

Welcome to What The Forecast?!! Finally, there is an accurate Android weather app that will explain, in real terms, how nasty it is outside.  You will never again wonder if you should just go back to bed (which, of course, you should).  Sometimes, it is better to just give up and try again tomorrow.   

WTForecast?!! features:
- Over 9607 completely obnoxious phrases describing the current weather conditions.
- Switchable profanity settings (On, Some, Off).**
- Highly accurate weather reports directly from AerisWeather.
- Listen to the latest weather saying using Text-to-Speech.
- Daily forecasts for 10 days.
- Hourly forecasts for 48 hours.
- Weather alerts from NOAA.
- Moon Phase.
- Air Quality Index.
- Select from U.S. (F) or international units (C).
- Description of basic weather terms used in the app.
- Backgrounds and precipitation that match the time of year and current weather conditions.
- Share your weather reports on Facebook, Twitter, etc.

**Make sure you go into the app settings and set the profanity setting to "On" for the full effect.  You won't be disappointed (Or, maybe you will. I don't know you.).

recentChanges:
- Updated weather and loading phrases.
- Minimal profanity filtering improvements.
- Fixed a text formatting issue that looked dumb when the pressure was N/A.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.
comments: First off this is the best way to find out the weather forecast. What I mean by that is that it's better to combine a less than desirable weather forecast with hilarious phrases about the days weather. I also think it's a nice touch that you can put in what you think qualifies as too hot and cold so that phrases are appropriate for your temperature threshold. Oh, and let's not forget the profanity filter. So if your like me and swear a lot you can turn profanity on, or select minimal or some.

UPDATED: Developer discovered the cause of the issues and quickly rolled out an update to correct the problem. Original review below: Like many others, my app is stuck on an old weather status/forecast and won't update. I've cleared the cache, force-stopped it, etc and even when I start it all over and it reloads, it's still (drastically) wrong information. It's been days and it's not worth spending any more time messing with at this point. Too bad, it's a fun weather app when it actually works.

I love this app. I live in Portland, OR, where it rains easily 9-10 months out of the year. I look forward to the snarky messages putting words to my mood wben I have to go out in it...& the smug ones when ol' Sol deigns to show his face. Great for a laugh at least once a day...& in spring & fall, at least a dozen times. Thanks!

Let's face it, you can check the weather on your phone in 2 seconds but this....this app always adds a giggle with its quotes....I would rather laugh while I get my "crappy" weather report vs just get my weather report. It also looks good, easy to use and reliable. Never had a glitch or 1000 pop up ads. Its AMAZING!!!!!!

Installed it, added my location, then the S.F. forecast was replaced by a blank blue screen. I hope you get the bugs worked out, cuz this has potential. Also would be great if the quotes stayed on the screen until the user swiped/tapped the screen. Good stuff there!

title: Weather forecast
description:
The weather forecast, one of the best weather application on store, one of the best choose fore you.
Weather forecast, which has accurate weather information for anytime and everywhere.
Local weather forecast & real time rain, storm, ice & snow reports...
By weather information, you can prepare your plan carefully, you will be successful at work and have better life. The application is very helpful with everybody. 
Weather forecast detects weather in your current location automatically. There are many information in weather forecast which includes weather condition, atmospheric pressure, relative humidity, visibility distance, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction, in addition to ten days future forecast, also hourly weather forecast.
Real-time temperature, rain, snow, humidity, pressure, wind force and wind direction are all in this weather application based.

Features:
- All is free, weekly, daily, hourly update with real time.
- Weather forecast for global, for all country: United States (US), Canada, Brazil, United Kingdom (UK), Sweden, Denmark, Italy, Germany, France, Portugal, Spain, Mexico, Finland, Norway , Russia, India, Japan, Korea, China, Australia, Vietnam, ...
- Weather forecast for all city: Washington, New York, California, San Francisco, Texas, Georgia, Florida, Ottawa, Hawaii, Toronto, Dallas, Nashville, Kansas city, London, Rome, Madrid, Oslo, Paris, Nancy, Dijon, Brest, Marseille, Rennes, Reims, Chamonix, Lyon, Metz, Grenoble,Strasbourg, Berlin, Tokyo, Singapore, Hong Kong, Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh...
- Full report. Displays all information of weather: location time, temperature, atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction...
- Detect location by GPS and network
- Search and manage multiple locations
- Supported notification
- Real time update widget
- Today, tomorrow, 3 days later, 7 days later. Weather for today, tomorrow’s weather… hourly weather in each hour.
- Weather description: Sunrise Time, Sunset Time, Humidity, Precipitation Probability, Visibility, Wind Speed...
- Real time weather maps & weather radar animations with your personal blizzard & hurricane tracker: Rain, snow, clouds, wind, temperature, Humidity, wave, pressure, current.
- View detail of daily weather and hourly weather.
- Chart to manage and view hourly and daily weather

Using weather application and get weather information daily and daily.
Download weather forecast for free and experience. The high-quality weather forecast application across your Android devices.

comments: This app is absolutely brilliant. I love that it shows you the wind direction which is useful as I ride a bike a lot, and is good to know. One thing that would be a good feature is if there was a tide time on it as well, which would be nice as I live near the beach. Keep up the great work.
Doesn't work. After trying to adjust the location the app keeps going to settings and refuses to go back to the app. Had to uninstall, will look for another weather app.
reliable and accurate. More trustworthy than my spouse's apple weather app. Easy to use, intuitive interface, easy to add new locations.
Easy to view & use. Non-intrusive. Accurate & packed w/needed info. Takes up small data usage & space.
Excellent app with intuitive graphics optimized for your location. Five stars!

title: Weather Forecast - Weather Radar & Weather Live
description:
⛅-- Accurate Weather Forecast --⛅

What the forecast? The accurate weather app can provide you a detailed weather forecast which is weather monthly, weather weekly, daily and hourly weather report, wherever you are! Weather Forecast - the accurate weather provides real-time live weather report, weather online condition.

comments: I had been using another weather site but it suddenly was not getting anything pulled up sometimes for 4 or 5 minutes. I decided to change sites and this site has been wonderful. When I open the site my weather info is right there, it's just what I needed! Thanks so much for a responsive site giving me all the info I need!

Outstanding app. Many intriguing features that would usually require purchase, or otherwise run very poorly. However, this app combines simplicity/ease of use, smooth performance, and many options concerning weather analysis, all at no cost. As with most apps, you will experience ads, although they do not overly exhibit themselves within this product. For all the attributes afore mentioned, I would not even begin to contemplate ads being a deterring factor in the consideration of this product.

So far so good, definitely better than the others where cities like Chicago, Phoenix, and Atlanta do not even show. I believe it might have an error though - it shows snow in cm instead of inches and you cannot change it. Big difference between 5-10 cm and 5-10 inches.

I was searching for a simple so that would give me the temperature and a brief weather description for a variety of cities that I either have loved ones in or an interested in traveling to. This app fits that bill. Nice to be able to go to one place and see a brief summary of that's areas weather
Much better than The Weather Channel app which stopped updating the current temp on my phone. My only issue is the radar doesn't show the radar, it's just a gray map.

title: Today Weather - Widget, Forecast, Radar & Alert
description:
Today Weather is a beautiful & simple-to-use weather app that provides the world's most accurate local weather forecasts. 

Features:
● Enjoy reliable and accurate weather forecasting with more than 10 data sources: National Weather Service (weather.gov), Accuweather.com, Here.com, Dark Sky, Foreca.com, Weather.gc.ca, Weatherbit.io, Open Weather Map, Yr.no, Smhi.se...
● Easy to view weather information anywhere in the world.
● Prepare for anything with 24/7 weather forecast and chance of rain.
● Protect your health with air quality, UV index and pollen count.
● Catch the beautiful moments of sunrise, sunset, full moon night with provided information.
● Alert severe weather: Alerts for Strong Wind, Heavy Rain, and Heavy Snow, and Thunderstorms through.
● Radar: A weather radar is used to locate precipitation, calculate its motion, estimate its type (rain, snow, hail, etc.), and forecast its future position and intensity.
● Rain, snow alarm: Alerts you when rain is approaching.
● Quick-view weather forecast using widget.
● Take and share photo with weather information for friend.
● Daily weather forecast notification.
● Other useful information: actual temperature, humidity, visibility, dew point, air pressure, wind speed and direction.

***Tips:
1. Widget doesn't update: Make sure you allow 'Start in background' for Today Weather in System Settings.
2. Problem loading widget: Try to uninstall and reinstall Today Weather app.

recentChanges:
Version 1.4.6 Build 11:
- New details widget 4x1 (humidity, uv index, air quality, wind...).
- Resolve the background issue for On-going notification on Android 10.
- Add humidity, uv index, air quality, wind for On-going notification.

↑ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ↑
Like Today Weather? Keep us inspired by giving a 5-star rating!
comments: If you're looking for a replacement for Weather Underground (R.I.P.), then Today Weather is perfect for you. Great UI, aside from a tad too much scrolling to get to an extended forecast. Excellent and transparent selection of data inputs, and the radar information is snappier than many 1st party apps. I wish the widget contained more info than just the temperature and a precipitation graphic, but it is attractive.

I purchased the full version of this application. , But i am not satisfied as the location services is not working properly. Whenever I travel from one place to other place , i enable GPS and mobile data to check the current location weather,but the application never detects the current location and the whole application bacome blank.

Honestly I'm a big fan of this app, for the most part the forecast is pretty accurate. I also like the fact that you can customize it. I just have a couple of problems with this app. I really don't like that you have to pay for the damn radar, to turn on severe weather alerts (rain & snow) also instead of showing random pictures you should actually show pictures of the location . For example, if your in NY then show a picture of NY that would be dope other than that it's good.

Please fix the radar! Everything else in this app is done beautifully, until you get to the radar. It doesn't show the history of the rain/storm. Just "current" and then the future prediction of where the storm is going. It doesn't look as good as most other radar graphics I've seen as well. Myradar used to be my app until they killed it with a very ugly UI update. I do think they have the best radar however.

By far the best weather app available. It's accurate, looks great and there are 17 widgets to choose from. What I like most about the widgets is that I can make most of them transparent. Once again a very accurate and nice looking app!

title: Weather
description:
Weather is exceptionally easy to use app for staying always updated with the weather conditions. 

The Weather app is specifically designed to be as simple and intuitive as possible. With just one click you receive the weather condition in your status bar at your current location.

The climate state is gorgeously animated so that you can almost experience it, seeing how the weather comes alive. 

The app is using Weather Underground as a data channel and the live updates are really tiny so that you would not use up your data cap.  

FEATURES

- Weather supports geo-positioning, retrieving the latest weather conditions for your current location

- An option to manually add your location

- Measure ambient temperature and UV index on supported devices

- Full support for Android TV

- Available on your favorite smartwatch. Full support for Wear OS.

- Add and track the weather conditions in multiple locations

- Weather is one of the most lightweight weather apps on Google Play! 

- Animated weather conditions - see how the weather comes alive!

- Widgets for different locations

- Hourly and weekly forecasts

- Intuitive, seamless user interface

- Support for the lock screen widget in Android 4.2

- Weather benefits all known screen resolutions  

- Offers quality support for Android devices - from Android 1.5 to Android 5.0

- Tap on the temperature to switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit  

- You can allow and disable the notifications

- Choose by yourself what will be the next feature of Weather! Leave a comment or send us an e-mail and help us make Weather the best app of its kind.

 

Get in touch with us and follow the latest news regarding our apps:
http://www.facebook.com/macropinch
http://twitter.com/macropinch
