summary: Stylish weather app in your status bar. Know the weather anytime and anywhere.
recentChanges:
* Weather for smartwatches [Wear OS] is now available on Google Play
- If you have subscribed for one of our subscription plans on mobile it should be active on your smartwatch too.

* Fixed min/max temperatures for some locations
* Added today's forecast on the daily list
comments: It keeps putting my location in a different city than where I actually live! Then, it won't let me remove the inaccurate data/location. This is not only inaccurate, but Very Annoying. If this continues, I will just have to find a different, better app.

It has graphics that are really likeable, asked neat, although I feel like there's not enough information. For example, whilst there's a slider that tells you the weather, hour by hour, I think there should be info that says if the rain, for example, is heavy, or light, a short burst, or prolonged. Also, the slider is always placed three hours (or something) away from the hour you're actually in. A bit confusing why, although you can just move it back to the hour you want. A great app though!

So far I am very pleased with this Weather app. When installed and then opened the first time it asked to allow location. After I accepted it opened immediately to my county and displayed the temperature that matched my digital readout here at home. It has been within a degree or two ever since. Easy to use and the ads are not intrusive at all. I've tried many Weather apps and none come close to this, the Weather app. Let's hope it continues along this well.

Nice clean modern weather app. It would be perfect if it just had a 1x5 widget, with a clock/date that takes you to the clock/calendar apps. Also, accurate forecasts are really important and it seems quite hit and miss - for example, yesterday it was 45°C (MEL) and this app showed a forecast of just 33°C right up till that morning, while weather websites and news forecast 40-45° a week ago!
Easy to see, Fast & easy to use.. NO nonsense! Shows lunar stages plus 24 hour temperature grid with ease. The best, just love this app!

title: Weather Forecast - Accurate Weather 2020
description:
The daily and hourly weather forecast is a weather channel with accurate weather information, it is updated every hour and you can see the weather for today, the next day and also the weather forecast for the next ten days which includes: relative humidity, temperature, precipitation, wind speed and direction, atmospheric pressure, etc.
Main features of the application:
- Free and comprehensive: Weather forecasts for more than 200,000 cities (Paris, California, New York, London, Houston, Washington, San Francisco, San Francisco, Texas, Georgia, Florida, Ottawa, Hawaii, Toronto, Dallas, Nashville, Kansas City, Rome, Madrid, Oslo, Paris, Nancy, Lile, Brest, Marseille, Rennes, Reims, Chamonix, Hanoi, Lyon, Metz, Seoul, Strasbourg, Berlin, Tokyo, Singapore, Hong Kong, Ho Chi Minh, Dubai, Johannesburg, New delhi, ....) for free it is a free weather channel.

- Enable and disable weather notifications and the application lock screen.

comments: This weather App is highly informative. It allows me the choice to decide whether to go out for the day or stay in. It is far superior to other apps I have tried which do not get it right.
The app is very good but it has to be wider than this. That's to give room for viewing other cities around the world. But it explains weather in detail, very clear and discriptive 👍🏻
I like it a lot. It is not intrusive, compact yet full of revalent info. I just wish there was a way to rotate the display to horizontal on my tablet...
I love this app. It tells me everything I want to know just by opening the app. It gives me weather forecast for the next 7 days. I recommend everyone use this app. Try it, you'll like it.

App itself is accuracte but I would like the notification in my status bar to be accurate as well. Unless you physically open the app the status bar will stay at the same temp for days, so what is the point in the status bar notification?

title: Free Weather Forecast App Widget
description:
🏆 More than 50 million users’ choice! A Popular weather widget app for you!🏆
This weather widget is a full featured, completely customizable digital clock and weather forecast app.


With this weather forecast app, you can get daily and hourly forecasts, severe weather alerts, daily&7 day weather updates, fancy clock weather widgets, weather news and global weather. 

————Features————

Realtime local temperature checker & live local weather 

This clock weather app displays weather temperature based on your current location. You can also add more cities to your city list, so that you can check global weather anytime.

Hourly forecasts

Before you go out, you can check this free weather app to get prepared for unexpected weather changes. In addition, you can also check hourly temperature and rain probability to plan your outdoor activities.

Daily weather

Besides, you can also check today&tomorrow forecasts (7 day weather forecasts) with this temperature app. With this accurate weather report app, you won’t get caught in the rain again!

Severe weather alerts

This climate app can also turn into a global weather tracker and it can send you severe weather alerts to help you get prepared for upcoming weather changes.

So in another word, you can see it as a rain app of minute-level precision, as it can inform you these severe weather and sudden temperature change ahead of time.

Distinctive clock weather widgets & weather themes

This weather pro app is packed with different weather themes and temperature clock widgets to decorate your home screen. In addition, these weather widgets for android also display radar information like accurate outside temperature, forecasts, sunrise time and sunset time, humidity, air pressure, wave, UV, and cloud info.

Free weather radar

In our store, you can also find many customized widgets with free radar to decorate your phone. With the help of weather satellite map, you can check weather more intuitively. 

Detailed weather updates

In this daily and hourly weather app, you can get more than just temperatures and clock. You can check humidity, visibility, UV index, air pressure, wind speed, sunrise time, sunset time in different units.

Global weather coverage

This accurate weather app enables you to add global cities on your check list and get real-time local weather forecast information. Feel free to take this weather app with you everywhere you go worldwide!

Weather news
This world weather app is not just about weather. In this temperature checker, you can get the latest news covering society, entertainment and sports. 

Daily weather updates brief
Users can choose to receive daily weather updates brief report in the morning and evening to check weather today and weather tomorrow. 


Stay in touch
If you would like to help with the translation and localization, please write to: weather_support@amberweather.com

comments: After losing my original weather app, it took me a week of searching for another legitimate app. I'm able to add all the cities I want where my family lives to check the weather status there, as well as checking my morning weather before heading to work. Although frustrating, it was worth the week it took me to find this app, test it, and be completely satisfied. "Im Happy" I recommend this app to everyone. You will not be dissapointed and adds do not appear over important weather images ...

So far its nice goves me alerts on upcoming hazardous weather and it gives me an hourly forcast. Its been just about spot with temp and conditions. I wish the UI was less basic and had more options for user customization and in what order information was giving
Daily use to check out how weather is going to be, how roads are going to be , schools closed. It is a handy app to have especially if you have to work or travel.
Like the graphics and information. Time and lunar info is great. Enjoy the design. User friendly.
Good app, except too many ads.

title: Weather 🌞
description:
Weather is a beautiful and clean weather app, designed to be as simple to use as possible. With just one click you can check the weather for today, the weather for tomorrow and the forecast for the next 10 days.

The current weather for today and the weather forecast for tomorrow are gorgeously animated. See realistic rain, snow or thunderstorm weather animations, sun rays for clear days, the moon’s glow and the stars at night, moving clouds and more weather animations. They all reflect the weather making it come alive.

The background color of Weather changes to reflect the weather conditions making you almost feel the weather. From light blue for clear days to darker grays for cloudy days you’ll know how’s the weather like with just one glance.

The Weather app is using WetterOnline as a weather data provider, some of the most advanced weather forecasting provider available, which gives hyper-accurate data wherever you find yourself.

WEATHER FEATURES

● Current weather conditions and temperatures for today. Beautiful hourly graph for the next hours today and tonight.
● How’s the weather tomorrow? Easily check the weather forecast for tomorrow, including hourly.
● Extended 10 day weather forecast outlook.
● Swipe down to view detailed weather conditions: humidity, dew point, UV index, visibility, chance of rain, animated wind, pressure and sunrise/sunset.
● Animated weather conditions for today and tomorrow.
● Live background color reflects weather conditions.
● Automatically detects your location and retrieves the latest weather conditions for your current location.
● Add and track weather conditions for all your favorite cities and destinations
● Celsius and Fahrenheit weather units
● The app and the weather data is available in over 40 languages.
● Share the weather app and invite your friends on Facebook to use the weather app.

We are committed to building the best weather app and would love to hear your feedback.

Let us know your thoughts here: contact@saevioapps.com

comments: Nice app and I love the realistic graphics!! I looked all over and kept deleting apps until I finally found the perfect one. Love the way they have the clouds, rain falling, lightning strikes, sunshine and snow details- keep up the great work!!!! Hard to find one like this, but if you find this one please keep it because it's close to the real deal plus accurate.
I love how it has sunrise and sunset time, the graphics are beautiful and its easy to read and understand. This app is going on my homescreen page!! Thank you developers!!
great app tells me everything I need to know only down side is I can't see all the info for future days like weatherzone otherwise great and beautiful graphics and pictures on the main screen
Very useful app, helps me any time to be prepared through the day.
Not very accurate, app currently says clear sky's for my location, its pissing it down with rain and overcast

comments: The app is faulty on my platform - Sam9+ with Verizons latest push. It appears to crash, but really it minimizes, and never connects to a degree greater than a simple clock and temp update. Repeated, and repeated ... Uninstalled and rebooted in varying sequences without resolution. I'm so bummed. I saw a weather app with a droid head, and I didn't realize I was deleting my old instances of this app - which I LOVE. (had it on the last 3 phones) ...you know, back with the 'Launchers'.

It shows me what I want to see. First, it shows the temperature and rainfall then it does me how many miles an hour the wind is blowing. I like it so far I've just got started when it but so far, I like it

The best selection of widget styles. The 4X2 live weather is perfect for my phone. I got the $2.99 version and nice to get rid of the ads. Since it is not specified, I think that this is a one time purchase.
Doing the work I do it is great to know the weather. It is also good for me to inform the travelers about the weather. Quite accurate.
Very useful & accurate app. I am proud óf having it . In radar segment the temperature is shown in F* . There should be option for C* also . Hopefully you will look into the matter . Thanks - Pawan

title: Storm Radar: Hurricane Tracker, Live Maps & Alerts
description:
Storm Radar is your NOAA forecast, weather radar and hurricane tracker with severe weather alerts. Stay safe and informed through rain and severe weather using 8 hour past to future radar, live wind speed, NOAA radar and tornado updates. Get ready for storm season with live wind speed and tornado updates from The Weather Channel.

Rain and floods tracker, wind speed and local temperature, our cutting-edge doppler radar technology lets you customize your HD weather map in real-time with GPS localization. Plus, get live severe weather alerts, including floods, lightning and hourly tornado updates from your NOAA storm radar and hurricane tracker. Plus, Storm will give you tornado alerts and hourly NOAA forecast in real-time (or up to 8 hours in advance) with our radar HD weather map. 

Storm offers you weather like you've never seen before. 

Storm Radar Maps, Tornado Alerts & Hurricane Tracker: TOP 3 FEATURES

1. GPS weather map and NOAA forecast in real time: view doppler radar imagery of severe weather patterns, including wind speed, lightning and rain.

2. Future radar maps: your weather map, storm radar and hurricane tracker predicts local temperature, risks of floods and hourly tornado trajectories up to 8 hours before the storm hits.

3. Live severe weather alerts with Storm: stay safe and track real time tornado updates and hurricane alerts from The Weather Channel.

Your storm tracker keeps you in with our storm radar and hurricane alerts.
• The Storm future radar tool gives you data on all impending storms. Find out wind speed, lightning, flood warnings and much more.
• Weather radar maps are customizable with detailed data overlays, including local temperature and seismic activity.

Get live weather alerts from The Weather Channel.
• Track rain with real time precipitation updates for your area. 
• When lightning strikes, be aware: your hurricane tracker sends live lightning alerts for your GPS location.

Chase the perfect storm with your tornado tracker, or get home before the rain starts. Storm uses cutting-edge doppler radar to help you to stay safe and informed in any weather.

Find all the weathers maps you need to stay safe, and unlock and track even more maps and hourly visualisations with our ad-free version.

*Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life
----------

THE WEATHER CHANNEL: WEB & SOCIAL MEDIA 

Forgot your phone? Access Future Radar and many of the top app features on the web, wherever you go. 

Find us on the Web: weather.com
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/theweatherchannel
Follow us on Twitter: @weatherchannel

PERMISSIONS 
In order to provide personalized local weather data, alerts, and forecasts, The Weather Channel app needs permission to access your location.

recentChanges:
We are constantly working to improve your app experience. In this update:

• Upgrade to Premium! Access 20+ radar map layers, detailed storm insights and full screen mode and enjoy an ad free experience
• Performance enhancements and bug fixes.

As always, we appreciate your feedback. Please email us at twcstormradar@weather.com with any suggestions or questions. If you like these changes, please let us know by rating and reviewing us in the Play Store!
comments: STAY AWAY!! Hey look I'm changing my rating because I pay the sub fee and I still get ads and I cannot use all the features!! I double checked and when I attempted to "upgrade" it tells me already have it! Also it wont even let me report an issue! Fix this or I'm out! Edit: I canceled my sub because its still not working and I never received a response either here or the support email address. Very sad that they dont care about their customers. I'm moving on because this is a terrible app!

Poor features left to use. The storm tracks being pulled was the last straw for me a while back. Without this feature this app is just another run of the mill weather app. Now if you want it, you need to pay. I guess the adds weren't enough income for them. You can find a better app with NOAA or the weather channel. Save your money

An utter disappointment. When Weather Underground owned this app, it was the most useful storm and weather tracking app you could ask for. Weather Channel has turned it into a worthless money-grab. Sattelites and views locked down as 'premium content'. Spam and banners cluttering the view. Selling location data to god-knows-who. Shameful.

The good part of this app is that it takes you immediately to the radar so you can see what happening right away. If there is a storm approaching, you'll see it right away without having to fiddle around. It also has a feature that projects the weather radar a few hours into the future, so you can see when the storm will clear. The only reason I am not giving the app five stars is because you cannot buy it outright. If you don't want adds, you have to buy a subscription.

Loads and runs very fast, compared to other apps. Much smoother animation. The radar color-scheme is odd in "dark mode" - severe rain-cells (yellow-orange-red) always have a "halo" around them where there is apparently no rain, and then the green "mild" rain area appears outside of the halo. The color scheme only makes sense in "light mode". But otherwise a decent app.

title: Weather & Clock Widget for Android
description:
Stay updated with the latest weather observations and the most accurate future weather forecast.

Personalize your phone/tablet with the most elegant and customizable widgets, showing current weather, hourly/daily forecast, moon phase, time and date, your calendar events, next alarm, battery level.

Make decisions for your day with the most accurate hourly, 5-day, and 10-day forecasts displayed with elegant tools including graph charts.

comments: This used to be a good app. I paid for the ad free version years ago but now the ad free version has disappeared from the Google play. I've emailed the developer twice now but they haven't got back to me. The time on the widget doesnt sync with my phone time, sometimes up 20mins difference. I suspect the developer is giving up on this app which is a shame.

Overall decent app, but I really don't like the graphical representation of the hourly and 10-day forecast, which is completely different from the prior version I had installed. It should at least allow the option to display either graphically (the new way), or the more tabular, scrolling option (as it was before). This is a huge reason I am reluctant to update any app that has been meeting my needs for years: someone decides to fix something that isn't broken, then forces it on everyone else.

Honestly a great app. I've been using this thing for years and installed on every subsequent new phone, mostly because of the great options for customization. It's quick and responsive and allows you to create wigdets that suit your needs. When you enter the app it does have ads but none of those obnoxious and annoying ones. 5/5 my dudes. Nice!

I really love having this widget with a very large clock and the real temperature with a "feels like" listed as well. But too frequently, the weather clock, the big clock, and the real time are all different. The two clocks on the widget freeze and break and the only thing I can do to reset it is restart my phone. There has to be a better way.

Latest update w/Android 10 has issues. Clock on home screen doesn't sync at least 30% of time upon waking phome, have to open app to sync (suspect it has to do with not allowing any apps on my phone to use battery while NOT open, but I think that was what was draining my battery so fast). Temp hasn't synced a few times either. Three stars because it's generally a good app and it's my go to home page weather/clock app, but it needs improvement.

title: Weather 14 Days - Meteored
description:
Trusted by millions of Android users around the world and hailed by meteorology fans, Weather 14 Days is the official free App from TheWeather.com (Meteored). Featuring its own forecasts produced using the best prediction model in the world. You can enjoy a modern and original layout based around Google's Material Design to access detailed and highly accurate local weather data quicker and easier than ever before. With over 15 years of forecasting experience, we won't let the weather surprise you.

★CUSTOMIZATION★
Unlock new Color Themes by completing our in app Achievements designed to help you make the most of the app by discovering all the available features. Remember, the application automatically changes color when the temperature changes!

★WARNINGS AND NOTIFICATIONS★
Receive official weather alerts for your area from the National Weather Service, including warnings about storms, strong winds and other adverse weather events forecast for the next few hours. In addition, our optimal app Assistant can notify you about important weather changes in the coming days.

★WEATHER RADAR , FORECAST MAPS AND SATELLITES★
Now available! A new animated world forecast map based on the ECMWF showing the weather forecast for the coming days. Access animated weather radar of the last few hours provided by the NWS along with visible, infrared and water vapor satellite images provided by NOAA.

★FORECAST★
Check the current conditions along with the forecast for the next 14 days with a simple slide of your finger. Select a day to view detailed hourly information including temperature, precipitation, wind speed and direction, wind chill, pressure, cloudiness, humidity, sunset and sunrise times and even the phase of the moon. Don't forget to try turning your device sideways to see how the weather will evolve throughout the day with our amazing  graphics.

★WIDGETS★
After installing the App you can customize your desktop with the most modern widgets currently available. You will have access to up to 8 widgets with different sizes and weather data.

★SHARE★
Share weather forecasts with your friends and family anytime you want with whatever device or social network you like to use such as: WhatsApp, Twitter or Facebook.

★AVAILABILITY★
Find the forecast most relevant to your exact current position or search for your favorite locations from over 500,000 all around the world. Available in over 50 countries and 20 languages.


To use this app you must agree to the privacy policy, as well as the terms and conditions of Meteored.

Privacy Policy

https://www.theweather.com/privacy.html

Legal notice

https://www.theweather.com/legal_notice.html

comments: This is an odd one. I really like the UI and the accuracy seems ok BUT, unless it's just me, I can't get the thing to automatically show me the weather based on my GPS location. And that applies both to the app and the widget. I keep thinking I must be missing something as no-one would design a weather app that can't work out where you are. So if I've missed something obvious, can someone let me know how to change this setting and I'll update my review.. If not, it's a massive oversight IMO.

So far no complaints. I use this app a a lot for outside projects. It's very informative without the miles of scrolling getting through all the useless news stories that are found on other weather apps. Easy to use, and informative. A refreshing combination.

Loving this app, after installing and uninstalling countless weather apps. Appreciate the comprehensive coverage without the visual clutter. Also enjoy that, at first glance, the windspeed and direction is displayed without having to click on each day to get that info. Keeping this app. Thank you.

Today: No response if the faulty behavior will be fixed, and when. Uninstalling the app. Yesterday: Widget does not update by itself. Update interval was earlier one hour, later I set it to half hour. No use. Need to click on the widget to launch the app, only after which update in widget takes place. Otherwise, stale temperature from whenever the app was last launched is displayed on the widget. Phone is Realme, on Android 9

This is a very good app for weather and is clear to understand. You can choose different colour themes and it has videos and pictures. It covers 14 days weather and it is good at being able to get other locations.

title: NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts
description:
Get a powerful yet easy-to-use weather station right on your device with NOAA Weather Radar Live & Alerts. Real-time animated weather radar images on a highly interactive map enhanced with severe weather warnings provide accurate weather forecasts that will prevent bad weather from taking you by surprise.

The app reflects accurate real-time weather conditions and provides you with the detailed meteo information you need to know: current and "Feels Like" temperature, the chance of precipitation and humidity info, wind speed and wind direction, pressure changes and more. Customize your weather report according to your taste – choose the information you would like to receive!

Take a look at current weather conditions or take the most of the top-notch functionality of the weather radar. Get a push notification whenever an alert is issued (tornadoes, flood warnings, snow storms, and more) without opening the app!

Real-time animated meteo radar on a highly interactive terrain or satellite map enhanced with severe weather warnings and alerts will meet the needs of even the most demanding users. Rainy, snowy, stormy or cloudy weather, you’ll be prepared for it all!

Short-term (24-hour) and long-term (7-day) accurate weather forecast for any location.

Units of measurement:
🌟 Pressure in inches, mm, kPa or mbar,
🌟 Fahrenheit/Celsius and Miles/Kilometers,
🌟 Wind speed in mph, km/h, m/s, knots, Beaufort.

World Weather Map:
🚩 Explore the weather on an interactive map. Weather icons will let you know what the local temperature is throughout the world. Tap on them to get more details.

Easy location search:
🚩 Toggle between cities and spy on weather in other parts of the world. Bookmarked locations will help you quickly switch to your favorite spots, check today’s weather or find out the forecast for tomorrow. 

Radar, Satellite and Precipitation Forecast:
🚩 Get real-time snow and rain tracking, mixed precipitation data, and cloud cover in high resolution and vivid colors by switching between radar, satellite and rain maps.

Customizable overlays:
🚩 Choose background maps and the number of frames; adjust opacity and loop speed for the overlays.

Resizable widget:
🚩 Add a nice customizable widget to your screen and get the live-updated weather information you want to know without opening the app.

More handy options for the best user experience!


National Weather Service watches and warnings are shown on the map as interactive warning boxes highlighting the territories they're active for. Tap any to get the card with the full alert text.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska, Hawaii, Guam, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan, Taiwan.

Precipitation Forecast, satellite images, and detailed weather info are available worldwide.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!
 
Go Premium and get some nice extra features:

♛ Alerts for unlimited number of saved locations;
♛ Higher Accuracy precipitation forecast option;
♛ Hurricane tracker for the whole duration of your plan;
♛ Lightning tracker with timely lightning alerts;
♛ Ad-free!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

comments: Great radar. The design is spot on and supports dark mode. Good info. Would be 4 stars but honestly for 5 bucks a month you get a radar and 10 day forecast, 24hr weather. The 10 day is not hour by hour either. Free apps and paid apps that are less have more map features like pressure maps and wind maps. What this app is it does well more features for the current pro version are high in my opinion. And no real free version (3 day pro trial then sub)

Accurate, Easy to use, and Affordable. **EDIT** I changed from a 5 star to a 4 because it is frustrating to watch the radar, seeing what is headed in your direction, then...grrrr... have to go to a different site to find out inches; even though you paid for the subscription.

Sends push notification for lightning, no matter what I set the notifications or lightning tracker to. A great app if the notifications worked, but without it it's basically unusable. It never stops going off of there's a storm within 30 miles.

I just downloaded it maybe an hour ago but so far so good! Its really accurate as far as when to expect rainfall and the lighting and thunder warnings are pretty spot on. If it stays this on point def wont need any other weather apps!!!

The free app includes descriptions of tidal conditions e.g. rip currents, winds, air pressure, precipitation and humidity. Re the questions below, no I have not seen them "charted" . Where charted = mapped

title: Weather
description:
The Sony Xperia™ Weather app is a simple-to-use weather app that provides you with current weather info.

- Shows wind, humidity, high and low temperature and wind information for your current location 
- Shows you the perceived temperature 
- Easily set up and swipe between different locations
- Simple to use widget - Multiple weather locations - Celsius & Fahrenheit

summary: Get up-to-date weather info with the Sony Xperia™ Weather app
recentChanges:
An app stability and optimization update - please download this update.
Changes : Performance improvement.
Note: If upgrading from 1.3.A.3.14 Please enter app at least once if using weather widgets, and if you're using current location tracking feature on any of our widgets, please give your consent in app for location sharing.
comments: I have a Xperia 10 mobile and was missing out on the weather app from previous Sony mobiles. Now I can have the same weather app and widgets as before so thank you for uploading. The experience is clean and easy to read and so are the widgets. It may not be for everyone but it is enough for me.

App works well for the current temp and a general reading for the next 3 days, but the app is very undetailed. I think at least an hourly forecast should be implemented. The widgets are wonderful though, and are the main reason I keep this app over others.
Not particularly useful. Shows the time and nothing else at the moment. Doesn't expand to show temperatures or predicted weather. The widget is pretty useless.

Over one year after contacting Sony about a number of showstopping bugs, nothing. Still not automatically updating to the correct GPS location. I am apparently in Helensburgh today, some 328 miles away! When can we expect a resolution? There has been no replies to any of my emails, after almost one year. Ignoring customers comments on Play Store too! Such contempt for your customers and not even a mailbox auto reply thanking customers for their email. Please can you reflect on these concerns?

Totally useless app refused to believe were I live, gives me rediculous weather alerts and forecasts for locationd hundred of miles away. Unfortunately I can't uninstall it because it's a Sony app. Now takes an age to open and even worse to close unless you restart the phone. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.

title: Fu*** Weather (Funny Weather)
description:
Sometimes, when we look outside the window, the only thing we can honestly say is: Oh $#&@*!
Well, let Fu*** Weather app do that for you. It will check the weather and show it in a very special way...

Features:
Detailed current weather conditions,
Hourly weather,
Forecast for a whole week (detailed, of course), 
Two-week forecast for premium users (requires a paid subscription/unlock)
Weather maps (radar, satellite, temperature, humidity, wind),
Home screen widgets,
Optional weather notifications,
Wearable app.

Everything served in a sarcastic, sharp-tongued (and sometimes even humorous) manner.

Fully customizable. You can adjust colors, temperature preference, add your own sayings or those submitted by other users and much more. 

Warning:
The app contains strong language. Lots of swearing, cursing and other profane words. Not politically correct. If you easily get offended, perhaps you should just watch the TV forecast and not bother me.

comments: The widget doesn't work unless you keep opening the app itself. I really don't know where there weather information is coming cause is never accurate. I thought that maybe buying the app it will fix these issues but not at all. I verified the FAQs page, check the settings, restart the settings and nothing works. Also the page, when you're looking for help is not friendly at all. I'm really disappointed as I used top have this app before and love it. Deleting and requesting refund.

I used to have this app on another phone and i loved it. Now, it wont even pick up my location.... and yes i have my location on! I just dont know what the deal is. Why isnt it working for me? Id gladly give it 5 stars if i could fix this problem....

The app worked for the most part. But over time it went downhill. It stopped refreshing on it's own. A few times I would refresh it myself but the wait time seemed to get longer each time I did so. When I would go into the menu to adjust something the menu icon would disappear entirely afterwards. I hope these bugs get fixed, the humor in this app is the only reason I keep it.

I just dl'd this not that long ago for the humor and it hasn't disappointed. I keep it on a side page, but seriously, it keeps me and my bestie in stitches. Sometimes you just need some off color humor in something so normal to make everything else okay.
I've downloaded many many apps in the past. This is the first one I felt deserved my time to rating. Great app!! Good job!! Fowl as f#<[, but lots of weather related information.

comments: Awesome from the radar to the theme selection. the weather outlook is all on one screen, just scroll down and select the weekly forecast or the daily one. Super simple and accurate.

This is an excellent app. Loads of information which is clearly presented and easy to understand. Above all it's accurate. Backgrounds match the current weather and you can add numerous worldwide locations. Recommended 100%👍

Absolutely trashed with ads. Every time you try to click on anything it pops an ad up fullscreen. What little I could see of the radar itself didn't show the weather very well. They should rename this to My Ads App, now with crappy radar included!
Like most people have said, way too many popup ads. The radar is not near as good as the other 2 that I use. I don't like the future radar forecast either. Very little real time information as well.

It looks to be a good app but I can't get past the ads long enough to find out. While trying to access the radar I was inundated with so many ads I had to give up. I can't evaluate something I don't have access to.

title: Weather Puppy: Real Time Weather Forecast & Radar
description:
Download Weather Puppy, the best weather app that makes you smile every time you check the weather.  
Get the best weather app for free! This live weather app includes puppies that change based on the weather forecast and time of day. It also provides real-time weather conditions, accurate hourly and 7-day forecasts, radar weather maps & more.
 
 Radar weather apps have never been this easy or convenient. See weather conditions and happy puppies – download now! 
 
 THE WEATHER PUPPY EXPERIENCE
 • Over 900 Puppies: 18 themes organized into 18 themes
 • Dark Sky Weather Network: Award winning forecast delivers hyper-local weather conditions in real-time
 • Animated Weather Map: See where the weather is

WEATHER NEWS FOR YOU
• Local Weather Radar: See local weather conditions, weather map & weather radar

comments: Best weather app out there and I really enjoy the puppy's they are so cute!! This app just makes my day. Anyone who uses this app n if u have any issues please don't do what I did and give bad review just email them and they will help you with any problems with their app. They helped me and responded quick. CAN YOU PLEASE ADD SHIH ZUHS !!!!!!!
Cute! Almost always accurate. I've been using this app for several years on both iPhone and Android, and I love it!
I love this so! It makes me happy. How can you beat that!? Plus, I can keep a weather eye on family in different areas. How cool is that!

Nice app I can have my breed of dog on my weather screen (German Shepherd) but I'd like to see an option to imbed a photo or photos of my all Black German Shepherd into the app, and my neighbor would like to be able to add his all white German Shepherds into the app as well as his other German Shepherds. And also the litter of puppies he just had!

Makes me very happy to see the puppies everyday plus informed of the weather. The only feature I wish it had was a small list of stats (not necessary but helpful / fun ) I've seen on some weather apps - telling allergy index, if need umbrella, if good weather for running etc . But honestly id rather have puppies fetch my weather and I can figure that part out myself. (However, if the developers are reading this and want to add these or port them in from another app, would make this app even )

title: Transparent clock & weather - forecast & radar
description:
Get accurate local or worldwide weather forecast easily with live weather updates, hourly and daily weather forecasts and timely weather alerts. Check the weather for today, the weather for tomorrow or the weather for the weekend with our easy to use app ⛅️

The weather app features the following:

⚡ Local weather: Automatically keep track or your location as you move and get accurate real time weather reports

⚡ Support for different weather providers and thousands of weather stations worldwide to provide the most accurate weather forecast information for any location in the world

☀️Complete weather report 


- Live weather conditions, current temperature, feels like temperature, high and low temperatures, humidity, probability of rain and snow, wind speed and direction, heat index and more

- Daily weather forecast summary for the next 7 days

- 12 hour weather preview (temperature, precipitation), comfort index (dew point, humidity, wind chill, feels like), UV index and wind forecast

- Sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, moon phases and daylight duration

🌥️ Extended weather forecasts. 10 day weather forecast, hourly weather for 72 hours and wind forecast for 72 hours, each with detailed weather conditions

🌩️ Weather radar. Radar images for the following layers: temperature, precipitation (rain and snow), pressure, wind

🌡️ Temperature notification. Keep track of the current temperature at all times.

🌧️ Weather graphs. Get instant access to the most important weather details

⚠️ Live weather alerts. Get notified for selected weather conditions and receive alerts about good or bad weather well in advance

🖼️ Live wallpaper. Automatically change the home screen wallpaper according to the current weather conditions

🌎 Worldwide weather forecasts. Get accurate worldwide weather reports for any location. Add up to 10 locations worldwide and easily keep track of the weather and time

Using specialized weather providers, our app can give accurate weather forecast for any city, area or neighborhood in the USA like Brooklyn, Bronx, Manhattan, NYC, San Francisco, Houston, Dallas, Austin, San Antonio, e.t.c.🗽 

The app can also display accurate weather forecast for any other city or area in the world, from Australia to Canada, UK, France, Germany, Spain, Italy, Portugal, Greece, Sweden, Russia, Ukraine, Poland, China, Japan, South Korea, Mexico, Brazil, Argentina etc 🏖

⏱️ Various weather and clock widgets with many customization options

📐 More personalization options
- Weather backgrounds and layouts
- Weather icons and widget skins
- Fonts and font sizes

⭐️ Premium features (available with subscription)
- No ads
- Extended temperature notifications
- Animated live Doppler weather radar. 🛰️ Our animated radar option supports different  map layers (precipitation, satellite, temperature cloud) and map styles

🏆 Regular updates
- We listen to our users and we work to make our app better

👍 Download Transparent clock & weather now and get accurate weather forecast delivered to your smartphone for any location worldwide. Plan your weekends or holidays with ease and stay prepared for good or bad weather with our free, simple to use weather app!

comments: See "Weather and Clock Widget for Android" for better layouts (vertical symmetry), easier on the eye; needed info more clearly seeable. That it's more attractive is also nice. "Transparent Clock" has richer data, full transparency lacking in the other app. So it's this one that's the keeper.... if devs could just have a look at the other app and emulate their widget layout. PS I'd MUCH rather have precipitation as a line graph please, as in WU, but with past precip included. TY. Lovely app.

Of my over 100 apps, this is the best-designed, fastest, and most useful. I was a top Systems Programmer for 35 years for large corporations and the NSA, so I know good software when I see it. I've tried the other weather apps, and THIS is the one to get!

I have used this for many years & paid to get rid of adds. I feel a bit cheated as the app is now fill of adds & the subscription model is a no go for me. Are you going to refund all the people that paid to get adds removed? I think I will be looking for something else. Thanks for the answer. Fixed! You were right I was using the wrong version.

Really nice weather app. Customization is great! Only two small things keep me from giving 5stars(heck 10 stars). First is the static radar..hate it.. secondly I don't like reoccurring charges, which makes this app unaffordable. The second thing would take care of the first, but it's not worth it.

It's working exactly as it should now. Before I always had to manually update my temp, just to see what it was currently. Now it updates without any help from me and it gives up to date inclimate weather alerts!

summary: A simple and beautiful weather app for OnePlus users.
recentChanges: Other bug fixes.
comments: App used to be great, with AccuWeather being the source. The Weather Channel doesn't even find the cities I'm looking for now, which AccuWeather found promptly. And the weather readings are definitely less accurate than before.

Without background location permission still useless. Maybe it was caused by new restrictions by Google in coming Android 11, but if any apps are to have background location, it should be weather apps to provide continuous info.
Excellent application. Very good support team. After the update to version 2.6.1, everything works perfectly
It used to work perfectly fine, but since the update my city Weston, FL dissapeared and isn't listed as a city anymore. All the surrounding cities are listed but mine, please fix.

Can't believe this goes through the weather channel now. Their reports of the weather are so inconsistent. At least AccuWeather was always correct and on point. Since the newest update, at night it no longer shows the daily high but instead shows the current temp, daily. Will definitely be looking for another weather app now.

title: weather
description:
Weather forecast app  is a weather channel or weather network which forecast weather today, weather tomorrow, weather of 7 days in future.

Weather information or weather report is very important. Nowadays we can see weather today, weather tomorrow by watching TV, surft web on Computer or Mobile phone. It is really convenient if you have weather app in your phone.
With a reliable weather channel or weather app on your hand, You can answer the question "what is weather today, what is weather tomorrow?" very quickly. This make your life more confortable with suitable plan.
Weather forecast app give you many weather information. Weather today will be updated hourly, it is realtime. Weather today is reported with 24 hours. Weather forecast app also has a weather report on weather tomorrow, also 7 days weather forecast
Weather forecast detect your location automatically. Your local weather will display in some seconds. You also can see weather of many places on the world. If you are in New York, You can see London weather, Paris weather, San Francisco weather, Houston weather...

Weather channel app is very easy to use. Please open app, enable data service (Wifi or 3G/4G network) then you receive the weather forecasts in your local location.
Then weather report provides current weather forecast, weather observation for all world locations, Weather forecast searches for your address automatically, you can choose temperature unit is Celsius or Fahrenheit.
There are many information in weather forcasts which includes atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction, in addition to ten days future forecast, also hourly weather forecast.
Realtime temperature, humidity, pressure, wind force and wind direction are all in this weather app based.

Weather channel has a lot of features:
- Free Weather channel, weather network. Available everywhere if you have data network (Wifi, 3G/4G network).
- See weather of any places ex: London weather, Paris weather, San Francisco weather, Houston weather... You just need to search for the place you want and add to location list. Then pick up that location weather anytime.
- Forecast many weather information. Displays all information of weather: location time, temperature, atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction
 This weather and climate app offers daily weather, hourly weather forecasts and monthly weather forecasts. Meanwhile, it also provides interstate travel weather forecasts and forecast weather and wind.
- Today, tomorrow, 3 days later, 7 days later. Weather for today, tomorrow’s weather, … hourly weather in each hour.
- Automatic location detection by network or GPS.
- Add and track the weather reports in multiple locations


please download weather forecast app, you have weather channel on your mobile. You have weather today information, weather tomorrow information on your hand.

title: Neffos Weather
description:
Product highlights

— Accurate weather forecast: Neffos Weather works with the world's best weather data sources to provide you with the most accurate weather information at all times.
— Precise positioning: No matter where you are, Neffos Weather can provide you with accurate local weather information.
— Real-time weather display: Real-time display of current temperature, weather conditions and other information.
— Weather change reminder: When the weather changes such as rain, snow, hail, and cooling in the alert city, Neffos Weather can send timely reminders to remind you to pay attention to weather changes.
— Severe weather warning: when severe weather is expected in the alert city, Neffos Weather can send weather warning notices in time to remind you to take precautions against bad weather. The weather warning feature is currently available in most European countries, USA, Canada, Australia, and Japan.
— Support multiple languages: support more than 20 languages such as English, German, French, and Arabic.

Custom desktop widget

Neffos Weather offers three widget styles for your free choice: “current weather” widget, “time + current weather” widget, and “current weather + future weather” widget.

We hope you enjoy Neffos weather app, thank you for your support.

comments: Everything looks great except for the temperature display. It reads low/high instead of high/low. The main temperature display below city name should be thinner like iPhone display. This app is quite good but sometimes it doesn't refresh enough, therefore I have to refresh it manually and a times the weather is not always correct. I will give 5 stars when the developer fixes that. Hope developer will fix it soon....Thank you.

*NOTE: Will update the star if this feedback has been taken an action. ... The app performance is great. Smooth. Wasn't laggy. Data provided might be latest. But, I have one problem that occurs me over and over, it keep reminds me the same thing every day that to bring an umbrella whenever I go out. Even my country right now facing prolonged drought. I still don't understand. So, I take it as positive advice that to prepare myself before something went side ways. Thank you!
5-stars, excellent design, user interface, readability, accuracy. Some didn't like the 24 hour times, but I prefer them. No ads that I saw. Couldn't get better. Thank you!
Most accurate weather app in my location. Only small glitch notification text color in dark mode. Thanks
Amazing weather app, great ui and accurate readings but I wish I could choose the weather providers but that's not a problem. My main problem is that I can't toggle between 12hr and 24hr time format.

title: Daily Weather Home - Weather Widget and Launcher
description:
Unlock a new phone experience with our launcher and weather widget 🌌

1) Customizable weather focused home screen/launcher with a variety of available icon packs and wallpapers 
2) Full screen weather widget with daily and weekly weather outlooks
3) Unlock powerful voice enabled search that supports all major search engines

Daily Weather Home is the fastest, most accurate weather tool available for Android.  With rich, interactive maps, minute by minute updates, and over 43,000 available zip codes, Daily Weather Home offers the hyper-local precision forecast you need to be ready to take on any weather condition, from a high UV index sunny day, to a sudden arctic blast.

Offering fast, one-swipe access, Daily Weather Home raises the bar for extreme and severe weather preparedness, giving you a superior, hi-resolution view of the conditions most likely to affect you.  And with optimized one-touch voice search, you’ll never be far away from the information you need.

Key Features:

•	Uncluttered, efficient user experience:  Get to the information that matters, fast.  Receive timely weather alerts, <15 min updates, and enhanced forecast precision.

•	Instant Search:  Whether by voice or text, DWH 2018 was built to optimize your search experience.  Enjoy fast, intuitive, and accurate search. 

•	Fast, Hyper-Local Radar:  Access HD radar images and daily forecasts with minimal load times.  DWH 2018’s lightweight architecture ensures you won’t spend time waiting for important images to load.

Daily Weather Home takes all the best weather information and combines it with easy access to your favorite apps and lightning fast search.

ABOUT THIS VERSION:

Daily Weather Home delivers an intelligent Android experience that will make your daily life better. It's 100% FREE and loaded with potential for more features in coming updates! Let us know what you think. We hope you love Daily Weather Home.

title: Weather Home - Live Radar Alerts & Widget
description:
Get live local weather forecasts and storm alerts directly on your home screen with the Weather Home – Live Radar Alerts & Widgets launcher application. 



Accurate weather forecasts, real-time alerts and severe weather warnings are available on- demand. Get today’s weather forecast, spring updates and more! 



Weather alerts from Weather Home are superior in their accuracy. Come wind, sun, or rain, you can stay one step ahead with Weather Home’s weather radar. Be prepared for the daily forecast or sudden changes in weather with live alerts and accurate weather forecasts. Daily weather snapshots provides weather updates and severe weather alerts.





Accurate weather forecasts - 5 reasons why you’ll love using Weather Home:



⛅ Accurate hyper local weather forecasts whenever and wherever you need them - Weather Home’s accurate local forecast won’t let you down. 



⛅ Severe weather warnings that keep you safe - Be prepared for any severe weather event on the horizon with real-time weather warnings and storm alerts.



⛅Today’s temperature in detail - Heat index tells you the difference between how the weather looks and how it actually feels. 



⛅ Weather updates wherever you are - Get local forecasts when you’re at home or worldwide weather updates when you’re away.



⛅Live weather 24/7 - Check up to 15 days in advance or check out our weather radar for accurate weather forecasts every minute! 





Local forecasts, today’s temperature and more! Live weather stats give you real-time weather updates. From storm alerts, severe weather warnings, and humidity reports - all the weather warnings you need are right there in the app.



Go beyond weather with additional features: the Weather Home launcher includes themes, news, popular videos, a -1 screen with detailed weather reports, all conveniently added to your home screen for quick access.



The daily forecast, severe weather warnings, storm alerts and more! Features that will help the Weather Home app work for you:



• Local forecasts that you can personalize, depending on where you are in the world. Don’t get caught in the wind or rain! 

• Today's weather forecast and beyond. Look up to a week ahead to ensure that you’re prepared for any spring weather alerts with Weather Home’s weather radar technology. 

• Live weather, in real time! Get the most up to date weather alerts.

• Weather forecasting is brought to life with trending videos from Weather Home’s news team. 

• Daily forecast updates filtered according to your preferences. Hide any weather alerts that aren’t appropriate for you.

comments: It always let's us know what kind of weather to expect and plan for whatever happens each day. It's a life saver and always right . description:

I like the app but it would have been amazing if there was any feature or setting by which i can see the meme and weather forcast on my homescreen instead of opening the app to see it. If that feature already exist let me know how tp set it cause i have no clue.

It will not load after the update. Removing the POS app, even though I liked it before the update, and going to something else
Love Grumpy Cat! The app is easy to use, and Grumpy Cat makes me smile even in bad weather.

title: Weather Frog Shortcut
description:
This app allows the creation of a shortcut to the google weather app, also known as the Google weather frog app.
This App is Open Source and can be found here https://github.com/vabene1111/Android-Weather-Frog 
Droidenschmiede is not affiliated with Google Inc. This App simply allows to open the weather app once, so the user can create the native shortcut. After that the app can be uninstalled.
descriptionHTML:
This app allows the creation of a shortcut to the google weather app, also known as the Google weather frog app.
This App is Open Source and can be found here https://github.com/vabene1111/Android-Weather-Frog
Droidenschmiede is not affiliated with Google Inc. This App simply allows to open the weather app once, so the user can create the native shortcut. After that the app can be uninstalled.
summary: Allows manual creation of the google weather shortcut
recentChanges:
🇷🇺 Added russian translation
👍 Small bugfixes
comments: Super easy and very helpful app. After my Samsung S9 did an update I lost my Google weather app and couldn't get it from play store. Once I downloaded this frog app I was able to access Google weather and add the shortcut back to my home screen! I was soooo relieved, it's my absolutely favorite weather app! It tells me what I want tio know without a bunch of extra background stuff.
Love the Frog and it disappeared when my system crashed. Comparatively easy to get him back. Good information and quite thorough and accurate! Keep the Frog alive!

I don't know what blocked me from installing Google's familiar weather app on my new phone, but it was very irksome. Happily, Weather Fog Shortcut solved the problem!!! As advertised, you can then uninstall WFS. A great help.
The frog is cute but it doesn't showup sometimes. I would give you a 5 star rateing if it wasn't for that.
Just the right amount of information with nice background, not crowded.

title: Free Weather Forecast & Clock Widget
description:
🏆 More than 50 million users’ choice! A Popular weather widget app for you!🏆
This weather widget is a full featured, completely customizable digital clock and weather forecast app.


With this weather forecast app, you can get daily and hourly forecasts, severe weather alerts, daily&7 day weather updates, fancy clock weather widgets, weather news and global weather. 

————Features————

Realtime local temperature checker & live local weather 

This clock weather app displays weather temperature based on your current location. You can also add more cities to your city list, so that you can check global weather anytime.

Hourly forecasts

Before you go out, you can check this free weather app to get prepared for unexpected weather changes. In addition, you can also check hourly temperature and rain probability to plan your outdoor activities.

Daily weather

Besides, you can also check today&tomorrow forecasts (7 day weather forecasts) with this temperature app. With this accurate weather report app, you won’t get caught in the rain again!

Severe weather alerts

This climate app can also turn into a global weather tracker and it can send you severe weather alerts to help you get prepared for upcoming weather changes.

So in another word, you can see it as a rain app of minute-level precision, as it can inform you these severe weather and sudden temperature change ahead of time.

Distinctive clock weather widgets & weather themes

This weather pro app is packed with different weather themes and temperature clock widgets to decorate your home screen. In addition, these weather widgets for android also display radar information like accurate outside temperature, forecasts, sunrise time and sunset time, humidity, air pressure, wave, UV, and cloud info.

Free weather radar

In our store, you can also find many customized widgets with free radar to decorate your phone. With the help of weather satellite map, you can check weather more intuitively. 

Detailed weather updates

In this daily and hourly weather app, you can get more than just temperatures and clock. You can check humidity, visibility, UV index, air pressure, wind speed, sunrise time, sunset time in different units.

Global weather coverage

This accurate weather app enables you to add global cities on your check list and get real-time local weather forecast information. Feel free to take this weather app with you everywhere you go worldwide!

Weather news
This world weather app is not just about weather. In this temperature checker, you can get the latest news covering society, entertainment and sports. 

Daily weather updates brief
Users can choose to receive daily weather updates brief report in the morning and evening to check weather today and weather tomorrow. 


Stay in touch
If you would like to help with the translation and localization, please write to: weather_support@amberweather.com

title: Flowx: Weather Map Forecast
description:
Visualize the forecast, for anywhere in the world, with the unique Flowx weather map and graphs.  Move your finger across the screen to control the forecast animation over time.  Select the data for your needs from 30+ data types and 18 forecast models, plus radar reflectivity and hurricane tracks.  Use Flowx to plan around the weather, for aviation, fishing, sailing, surfing, cycling, hiking, photography, storm tracking or anyone interested in the weather.

The advantage of Flowx is the interactive forecast map, giving you the 'big picture' and enabling you to understand the weather.  With Flowx, you have control of the forecast information: compare models and interpret what the data means for you, to best plan your activities.

Flowx was awarded Google Play Editors’ Choice: The 5 Best Weather Forecast Apps.

Flowx Features:
Data Types: 30+ data types including precipitation, cloud, wind, temperature, pressure, humidity, waves and more.
Data Sources - Free:
• NOAA GFS (FV3) - Global
• NOAA NWW3 - Global
• CMC GDPS - Global
• CMC GDWPS - Global
• NOAA HYSPLIT Smoke Data - Continental USA
• Storm/Hurricane Tracks (NOAA & CMC) - Global tropical storms
Data Sources - Pro:
• RainViewer Radar - 82 countries
• NOAA NAM - Continental USA
• NOAA HRRR - Continental USA
• NOAA RTOFS Ocean Model - Global
• DWD ICON - Global
• DWD ICON-EU - Europe
• MeteoFrance ARPEGE - Europe
• MeteoFrance AROME - France
• European Consortium HIRLAM - Europe
• DWD COSMO-D2 - Germany
• CMC RDPS - Canada, USA (incl. Alaska), Greenland, Iceland
• CMC HRDPS - Canada
• KNMI HARMONIE 2.5km- Netherlands
• KNMI HARMONIE 5km - Europe/UK
b>Map: use finger swiping to control the forecast animation over time.  Choose multiple data layers to display on the map, for example precipitation and cloud layers with wind streamlines.
Graphs: view the week’s weather forecast data at a glance.  Choose from a selection of graphs and use the 'compare function' to view all data sources at once.
Wind Streamlines: animated streamlines indicate wind speed and direction.
Wavefronts: animated wavefront lines indicate wave direction.
Widget: resize your widget to display multiple graphs.
16-Day Forecast: with pro version you can view up to 16-days forecast.
3-day Hindcast: with pro version you can view up to 3-days historical hindcast & radar.
Graph Editor:  with pro version you can customize your graphs by selecting data types.
Map Styles: with pro version you can choose from multiple map options.
Travel Mode: automatically updates the forecast for wherever you are in the world.
Offline Use: after updating the data, use the app offline to view the forecast without internet.
Permissions: minimal permissions required.
Pro Versions: choose the pro version option that best suits your needs, see in app for details.

Try Flowx Today: visualize the forecast and understand weather systems - it’s the smart way to plan around the weather.

* Flowx was formerly known as WeatherBomb.

Contact:
Join us at forum.flowx.io to ask questions and discuss ideas.

Follow us on social media:
Facebook: facebook.com/flowxapp
Twitter: twitter.com/flowxapp
YouTube: youtube.com/flowxapp

16-Day Forecast: with pro version you can view up to 16-days forecast.
3-day Hindcast: with pro version you can view up to 3-days historical hindcast & radar.
Graph Editor: with pro version you can customize your graphs by selecting data types.
Map Styles: with pro version you can choose from multiple map options.
Travel Mode: automatically updates the forecast for wherever you are in the world.
Offline Use: after updating the data, use the app offline to view the forecast without internet.
Permissions: minimal permissions required.
Pro Versions: choose the pro version option that best suits your needs, see in app for details.

* Flowx was formerly known as WeatherBomb.

recentChanges:
Release 3.228 (3 Mar 2020)
=======================

- Firstly, Happy New Year to everyone. 2020 is going to be a great year.

- Apologies for 3 months of no releases. I've been working on major changes to the backend.

- Added major polish to how we add data and edit places. Check out "Edit Data" and "Edit Place" in the menu.

- Long-press the data icons to reorder them.

- As mentioned there are major changes to the backend so please watch for and report bugs.
comments: Really useful meteogram that is missing two things : 1) the temperature Y axis is not clearly labeled. Maybe add horizontal lines for each 5 degrees and have the number clearly on the middle of the line to the right. 2) For the widget, it would be great if it showed the current conditions in a box to the right. Temperature large, smaller wind and precipitation maybs.

This has been an amazing app. Truly well done. It was something that I used daily. I had the silver subscription which included several models. Imagine my surprise when I discovered that even though I have a subscription, now I have to pay more to get the same models that I was getting before. Why did I pay for a subscription with the promised models only to have them removed after I had paid. Very disgruntled about this.

Great weather app - my first go to for the weather. Most Popular apps have really rudimentary radars built in and basic descriptions of the days e.g. sunny with cloudy periods - not flow.x. This app has helped me plan my weekends by seeing exactly what weather is headed our way. Upgraded to a pro subscription to sorry the dev as it's so useful.
Exceptional!! By far the best weather radar map! It's always spot on!
Brilliant weather app. Appreciate how much work has gone into it. Definitely one of the best.

title: NOAA Weather International
description:
Retrieve real-time 7-day hyperlocal point weather forecasts and current weather conditions for worldwide locations from NOAA NWS based on your current location or any location in the world.

Not only are NOAA forecasts the most accurate, they provide unique point forecasts for every square mile which take into consideration all the variables affecting the weather at that point, such as altitude. This is especially useful in locations with highly dynamic weather patterns and is a great tool for being outdoors.

-View forecast & current conditions for your current location.

-View forecast & current conditions for any location in the world by map.

-Save favorite locations to quickly retrieve forecasts for them.

-Hourly forecast

-Animated radar, cloud cover, precipitation & wind imagery over Google Maps

-Hazardous weather alerts

-Current conditions notification

-Home screen widget

-Light and Dark Material themes

-Optimized for tablets

-Android Wear support

In-app purchase is available to remove ads.

Please e-mail me below with any bug reports or features requests. Thanks!

summary: Get pinpoint worldwide forecasts, radar & alerts from NOAA.
recentChanges: * Fixes for notifications on Samsung devices
comments: My go to weather app that uses NOAA data. I've stored several locations that I frequent which makes it easier to use. Wish it had features like graphing, hour-by-hour and 10 day forecast but it's quick and easy once you figure out to set a pin at the place you want.

Been using this for years and depend on it. It has a lot of very good features. This corrects a prior 2 star review. I updated to a later version of Android and was using an older version of this app. The current version works fine.
This is very useful app & once you get used to it, it's very easy to navigate. I uninstalled & reinstall it again & now it disconnect when you switch to a new window.

Good for what it does, but don't expect bells and whistles from it. What this app is, is a honest reporting of the freely available information from the NWS. What it is not, is fripperies and doodads to animate things or pretend it can forcast for 45 days. I do wish, though, I could set an auto-update schedule for the notification bar weather (like every hour, or when the reporting starting updates) which is why I withheld a 🌟 and call the app good, instead of great.
I have this app on my Galaxy A20 and it works well. I have been using the app on my previous Android phones. Great NWS Information and forecast all in one place. Nicely laid out.

title: Weather & Radar USA
description:
Key Features of Weather & Radar USA:
•	Hourly and daily weather forecast
•	Accurate all-in-one weather map
•	Interactive rain, snow, ice and storm tracker
•      Local temperatures, wind speed and UV index
•	Ski and beach resort info
•	Weather Widget

🌞 Weather App
Be up to date at all times with Weather & Radar’s free app! Always know if the sun will be out, a severe storm is approaching or whether a hurricane may be heading your way. The weather app will accurately display current and future weather conditions for your exact position in the US and around the world. 

🌦 Weather Forecast
Everything about the weather at a glance! The latest details on temperature, rain, probability of precipitation, snow, ice, wind, sunshine, sunrise and sunset times. Detailed data on air pressure, humidity levels and UV-Index. Plan ahead with the 14-day weather forecast feature.  

☔ Weather Map
More than just your standard radar map! Discover the all-in-one weather map, including cloud cover, sunshine, rainfall, snow, ice, thunderstorms and real-time lightning activity. This enhanced weather map allows you to track real-time meteorological conditions in your city, county, state or the whole US. Whether you’re in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago or Miami, track the movement of cloud formations, weather fronts and severe storms in and around your area.

🌞 Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device. Choose from 4 different widget formats and scale it according to your preference. 

🌊  Coastal Water Temperatures
Live near the sea? You can rely on Weather & Radar's free app to see water temperatures for all US coastal areas. 

❄ Snow info / Winter Sports
Planning a last-minute ski trip? Weather & Radar will tell you where the snow is! Access all ski and other winter sport info for many locations in North America and Europe. 

🌎 World Weather
You can rely on Weather & Radar’s free app for everything from timing your walks to dodge those showers, to planning outdoor projects, activities and events. Scheduling a trip or have a family member in another country? Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations at once. Global weather at your fingertips! 

Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and profit from the option to personalize your main page! 

Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.com.

summary: Accurate Weather App – Rain radar, storm tracker, local forecast & more!
recentChanges: Be ready for everything the weather may throw at you: Your app gets faster and more precise with every update!
comments: The app has some great features, is detailed, and seems accurate. However, you can't swipe to quickly check on other locations you've saved as you can with other weather apps. It is more cumbersome to view, for example, weather at wotk or where you plan to travel. And the widget is very limited on what you can display. For me, it's slways the little details that make an app great. This app doesn't have those details.

One of the best free weather apps I have found. I have tried them all in the last few weeks. While they all have nice features, this app gives me just what I needed. The simple feature of following you on your GPS, without hitting too many buttons is what I really wanted. There was another Dark app that I subscribed to for a year, but I really don't want to pay for weather. This app will not disappoint.

Showing actual clouds and rain data every 15 minutes is the thing that makes this app deserving 5 stars. However, in the latest update, I am unable to see the 12 hrs past actual clouds. I really liked that feaure. Also it would be great if there was an option to remove the blue/pink patch that overlaps the actual clouds in the map, so as I could see the actual cloud image when it is raining heavily. Thanks

The app is perfect with regard to weather information. However, It is surprising to note that this app shows India is a neighbor of Afghanistan. I wonder the source of this map, as it is factually wrong. I encourage you to correct it according to the ground reality of internationally accepted boarders of the world. Unless, you have an ambition to promote political propaganda in this region.

I really like this app. The radar map in particular allows you to see what kind of weather is heading your way. Lots of good detail about temperature and wind direction - we live by the sea and the latter is very important!

title: Weather Forecast

This live weather channel provides the fastest weather alerts, real-time weather conditions, accurate weather hourly, weather weekly, weather daily, & 10-day forecasts & more. It's a Real time local temperature checker & live local weather.☔️

Weather forecast’s weather tracker makes it easy to plan a weekend outdoors without battling the wind or rain. Weather updates you can rely on.
Get ready for wind and rain with the most accurate source of weather forecast. Daily temperature, wind speed and weather maps let you know if you need to bring a light jacket, sunglasses or your umbrella! Thanks to our extensive weather forecast and storm radar.
❤️ Key Features: ❤️
- Weekly, daily, hourly update with real time,totally free
- Offer 10 days weather and 24 daily in each hour
- The next 10 days of rainfall and 10 days wind forecast
- Severe weather alerts & Storm forecast
- Interactive radar maps, Weather satellite map 
- Detect your current location automatically
- Search and manage multiple locations
- Weather forecast for global, for all country
- View details of daily weather and hourly weather
- Full weather report. Including location time, temperature, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction and so on

everything you need is all in Weather Forecast: temperature, condition of wind, probability of rainfall,precipitation, air pressure, sunrise and sunset time, visibility, ultraviolet level, satellite cloud photo, humidity, dew point, etc

title: Radar Express - with NOAA Weather
description:
Radar Express gives you instant access to a high resolution animated weather radar and all the local weather information you need provided by the NOAA NWS. It's clear, simple, and fast-loading.

• Quickly view an HD animated doppler weather radar for anywhere in the United States.
• Check the current temperature and other weather conditions in any U.S. city.
• Read the latest alerts and hazardous weather discussion from the NOAA NWS in your area.
• Weather radar, alerts, and forecast all come directly from your local NOAA NWS office. 
• Forecasts from the NOAA NWS are some of the most accurate available.

Whether you want to know when it will rain, or you need to know how strong the storms are on the horizon and which direction they're moving, install the Radar Express weather radar app on your mobile phone or tablet now.

Radar Express is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration or the National Weather Service.

summary: Weather radar, alerts, and forecast from your local NOAA NWS office.
recentChanges: Fix for issue with weather data not being updated in certain areas.
comments: Revising from 5 to 4 stars because app doesn't remember last map position, zoom in level or play or pause mode selected. One must also clear off the weather statements/outlook things each time if you don't want them in the way. Just let the number of those represent. I've also noticed even though I can zoom out to see most of the continental US on my tablet I can't on my phone even though it's the same OS. Still my go to weather radar app at the moment.

I've used another weather app for quite some time and have been relatively pleased with its accuracy - even the radar. But comparing this to that one, this is hands-down more accurate. My other app forecasted a slight chance of snow, with nothing showing on the radar. I opened this app and it showed a small patch of snow falling where I live. I looked out the window and was amazed at the accuracy. What made it even more amazing was 5 minutes later it showed the snow had ended. It did.

This app is Ok, but it could use some upgrades. For instance, a satellite map showing villages, towns, and cities with weather systems (rain, snow, etc.) superimposed over it would be a vast improvement. As it is now, we don't really know where in the country we are. A longer time frame would also be helpful for the animated portion; it is currently so brief that it's hard to get a picture of the direction systems are moving.

A weather app that has no current temp is not very useful for planning your day. I've used the app for several years and for the most part, I've liked it. However, the last update removed the current temp, making it near impossible to plan my day. The weather is important in my every day life, I'm a farmer and the weather drives everything I do. Please fix your app, I don't want to delete you, as you have been important in my life for years now, like an old friend.

I have had this app before and very accurate in its weather. But I went ahead and got something more where I could see other countries weather. Come to find out all these has a weather apps want money, like a monthly fee. I just went back to Radar Express because it's always been a good app on the weather. This is the reason I give it five stars because it's an excellent app
