Seems it's covering all angles of weather forecast. Thanks.

title: Weather Radar Widget
description:
Three fixes in version 1.7.6:

   1) The "rock back and forth" mode checkbox was previously not saving its state properly.

   2) "Rock back and forth" mode now shows the intermediate images (as it was supposed to all along) instead of just flipping between the first and last image.

   3) The bug affecting people who purchased the ad-free version should now be fixed—two days ago, a coding error allowed ads to show up on the ad-free version! This should no longer be the case, but if you encounter it, please let us know, and we will definitely issue a refund!

Thank you again for your patience and support

WEATHER RADAR WIDGET SUMMARY:

High-definition radar, severe weather alerts, and pinpoint-accurate forecasts from the National Weather Service. All free with Weather Radar Widget.

With the included radar widgets all you have to do is glance at your home screen and you'll never be surprised by the weather again.

It's easy: create a widget on your home screen, choose a location, and there you go, up-to-the-minute weather radar on your launcher. Tap a widget to animate the radar without even opening the app! Plus, you can customize each widget's zoom level, map style, and transparency. Tap a radar widget to open the app for full-resolution looping radar, and tap again to get a detailed forecast. No opening apps, no waiting for downloads. Put the weather a glance and a tap away with Weather Radar Widget.

recentChanges: Fixed intermittent banner problem.
comments: Great app and radar is excellent. However, some of the narratives in the detailed forecast don't make much sense. But I am used to those statements and I just laugh it off. For the most part, I view this app every morning and it beats the weather channel.

I like the way the view starts with the entire U.S. and lets one get an overview. We do a lot of driving trips, coast to coast, and timing our departure times from Minnesota to have the best chance to avoid bad weather is really helpful. Local TV coverage rarely does that. Zooming in to our current local is quick & easy and provides the more detailed view of current conditions. Great app and always seems to work.

Widget stuck in endless "Preparing..." or "Updating..." loops. "Retry" usually results in a System message saying "Weather Radar Widget keeps stopping". "Info" links to "Error Details" telling me to check my internet connection (which is fine) or that "we may be experiencing technical difficulties & your should try again in a few hours". Well I've tried again for several months now & it's still fails. Gave up on any hope that the developer gives a damn. Reduced to 1 star.

It's simple to use, but it is different than the Raindar app that is not updated for recent Android versions. Raindar would remember the area you were viewing even without gps. Plus you could scroll all the way into your neighborhood and the radar colors wouldn't pixelate. I've tried several others, but so far weather radar widget is the closest to Raindar which was the gold standard

I have always been an avid weather watcher, but radar almost tells it all and it's my preferred method of what's going on and what's gonna happen by me. Wind speeds would be nice. I do have to apologize, but I haven't used your sight for at least 2 months. We take down trees and there just isn't enough hours in the day, but I choose your app for the simplicity of it. Keep up the good work!

title: Weather Live
description:
Check the weather around you and all over the world at a glance.
Rely on the accurate weather forecast and adjust your schedule to the weather coming in. You won’t even have to look out the window as the app will make you feel like you are already outside!

Weather is sometimes difficult to predict. This accurate weather app allows to find out a detailed forecast wherever you are, for any time of the day or for the next 7 days just by tapping on the icons:
- Current and “Feels like” temperature
- Lightning tracker
- Wind speed and direction
- Pressure and precipitation information 
- Sunrise/sunset time
- Weather Radar & Rain maps
and other useful weather data accompanied by live animations and graphics.

You can easily switch between detailed or compact layout to get weather information that is relevant for you. 

In addition, you can check the weather forecast even without opening the app. A visually appealing widget is easily integrated into your screen. Choose a detailed full-size widget or keep your home screen as clean as possible with just the essential weather information.

Go Premium and get access to interactive weather maps for the whole duration of your plan. In addition, become a Premium user and enjoy ad-free weather on your device.

You can choose from different subscription options :
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!

Please note that some supplementary features in the basic (free) version are subject to limitations (ex. UV index, 14 day weather forecast, Sun and Moon, Lightning tracker, Visibility, Air Quality index etc.). These limitations are also subject to change.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.

A clear and simple live weather app will show you everything you need to know about the weather in any part of the world right on the screen of your device.
Enjoy the perfect balance of beautiful pixels and accurate weather forecast!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

comments: I have tried many different weather apps but this one is perfect for me. (I've been using this app since July 2018) The circle widget is gorgeous and also includes the date and time allowing me to remove the standard clock widget. Information is very detailed and the forecast has always been accurate. I recently reported an issue to the developer and received a reply less than half an hour later! They resolved my issue very quickly (less than an hour from my initial email). Fantastic!!

Most of the important information on this app is premium edition, I have multiple weather apps on my phone and Weather Live was the only one that alerted to lightning 15 miles away. The only problem is that the nearest lightning to me was 734 miles away. So I checked the location and it was accurate to my location. I clicked to see where the lightning was and I was sent to a page to buy premium. Its pretty shady to give fake alerts just to sell subscriptions. Weather Bug is much better.

Very helpful for, it's detail in weather information needed. Also, other weather feaures I didn't know exist and now learning to apply. Just hope the live direction compass could be included in any proper box or space with map of viewer's desired location searched. Just a thought.., 10-Q mucho much. It's 2020 & Weather Live is still excellent running.., 10-Q again.

Really, really good! Visually, very appealing and also has lots of information. Layout is now customizable. Downsides (and reason for only 4 stars): Monthly subscription for ad-free version is steeper than I'd like. And as good as the graphics, icons, and layout is, I'd like to see an option to read a text summary of the immediate forecast.

Has been the most accurate and useful weather app I've used. Incredibly was even the most accurate during hurricane season, while local forecasters and even the weather channel were using a plate of spaghetti to plot hurricane paths the predictions on here were very close if not dead on. This will be my go to next hurricane season.

title: Weather App — Live Weather Today
description:
Get a powerful & easy-to-use weather station right on your smartphone! The app shows what the weather will be like in the next 7 days, and gives hourly forecasts for your chosen location.

Main features:
• View local weather forecasts and temperature for your current location
• See what weather conditions to expect on a daily basis, and view the forecast for the rest of the week
• The app offers home screen and notification panel widgets to help you quickly find what you need
• View real-time animated weather radar images on a map with severe weather warnings

All features:
• Full report: location time, temperature, atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different units, dew point, wind speed, and direction
• Detect location by GPS & network
• Search & manage multiple locations
• Supported notification
• Real-time update widget
• Weather description: sunrise & sunset time, humidity, precipitation probability, visibility, etc.
• Real-time weather maps animations with blizzard & hurricane tracker: rain, snow, clouds, wind, temperature, humidity, wave, pressure, current
• View detail of daily & hourly weather
• Change unit setting: temperature (C/F), time format (12h/24h), precipitation (mm, inch), wind speed (km/h, mi/h, m/s), pressure (mmHg, hPa, mbar)
• Weather forecast for all countries & cities: Australia, Canada, New Zealand, United Kingdom (UK), United States (US), Auckland, London, New York, Sydney, Toronto, etc.

Say Hello!
We are constantly working hard on making the app better and more useful for you. Please take time to leave us a nice review; this will really help us to give the best of what we have.
Contact us by email: support@weatherapp.me
Or like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WeatherApps

comments: Very nice app. It's generally accurate. Plenty of information which is clearly presented and easy to understand. Animated live weather backgrounds are excellent. Good selection of widgets. Would be nice if you could add more favourite locations and a shorter update interval would make the app more accurate .Recommended. Try it. You won't be disappointed. 👍
Like this app as it not only gives you present temps & conditions but air quality, humidity & temps by the hour.
Not easy to set up, also doesn't cover all locations I want.
Works very well and has plenty of useful information.
Not a bad app, preferably with visibility in miles.

title: Weather US
description:
The Weather app offers you accurate global forecasts, but especially for United States of America the forecasts are better, because it uses very complex weather forecast models, which are specially tailored for the US region. Using the accurate weather forecast provided by the Weather app you can plan your next ten days with confidence that the weather will not ruin your plans.  

FAVORITE FEATURES 

Free This is a free of charge weather application, all the features are offered for free.

Is almost like you look out of the window The application changes based on the time of the day, current location and weather condition to show you the current  weather.

Stunning animations  The current weather is presented using stunning realistic animations, for weather conditions like rain, thunderstorm, snowing, cloudy and others. Even if the weather is bad, the animations are beautiful :).

Accurate weather Forecasts  Get hourly and daily forecasts for any place. We use the world's best weather data providers, to get the most accurate weather forecasts. For the forecasts we use realistic icons to allow you to see weather conditions easily.

Current Weather Conditions  The Weather application shows you also the real time weather conditions for any place in United States of America(USA) or the entire world. Weather conditions like current temperature, humidity, atmospheric pressure, UV index, visibility distance, dew point, wind speed and direction for any locations in the world from the closest weather station from your location. If the  closest weather station is very far from you, it will use a very sophisticated weather forecast model to calculate this information for you precise location. 
 
Tomorrow's weather forecasts  Get almost the same amount of weather information for tomorrow like for today, like minimum and maximum temperature, wind speed and direction, humidity, dew point. 

Clean design - You get a lot of weather information, but it will be very easy to find what you want.

Global weather forecast   You can check the weather for any location in the world. For countries like: United States of America(USA), Canada, Brazil, United Kingdom (UK), Sweden, Denmark, Italy, Germany, France, Portugal, Spain, Mexico, Finland, Norway , Russia, Romania, India, Japan, Korea, China, Australia, Vietnam…
 
 Search and manage locations or places from USA or the entire world  You can search and manage as many locations as you require. For example you can search for cities or places from America like: New York, Washington, New York, Florida, Hawaii, San Francisco, Chicago, New Orleans, Seattle, Miami… Or you can search for places outside US like London, Rome, Madrid, Oslo, Metz, Strasbourg, Bucharest, Budapest, Paris, Ottawa, Toronto,  Tokyo, Singapore, Hong Kong, Hanoi... 

Hourly wind speed and direction   Shows you the direction from where the wind originates and the wind speed hourly for the next 48 hours.

Hourly precipitation quantity  Shows you the precipitation quantity hourly for the next 48 hours. One millimeter of rain corresponds to 1 liter per square meter of water on the surface, or approximately 10 millimeters of snow.

Hourly probability of precipitation  Describes what is the chance that  precipitation will occur in your area.

Automatically detects your location  The weather can be different even in the same city, if the city is large. The app can automatically detect your  precise location, to tell you the  current weather conditions, hourly forecast or daily forecast.

- The weather channel: temperature, wind, humidity, dew point, precipitation, visibility, pressure, water, sunrise sunset, storm, stormshield, rain alert in one wetter app

comments: 10 DAY FORECAST I have been using this specific 'Weather App', along with adding the weather widget to my Samsung Galaxy S8 cell phone & my Samsung Galaxy Note and ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! I can add as many cities in the USA, although with ANYWHERE in the world, (my husband's family have a 2nd home in Crete, Greece off the side of a mountain overlooking the beautiful water and they go there in the summer (mid June-mid-late August), thereby allowing me to see what type of weather they are enjoying!

It has great widgets, a good layout and the daily update is a wonderful feature, but it has no "feels like/real feel" which often makes this inaccurate at best. Would be a fantastic app if it had real feel (with it also shown on the widget) but for now you'd be better off installing another.

Increase the touch sensitive area for the day's weather! I've to specifically touch on the day text(MON/TUE/etc) to view the weather for that day. Please increase the touch area to include the rectangle box around the day's text too.

I've used this as my sole wx app for about a year, but giving it the heave-ho now. It is so brain dead when it comes to adding new locations. Today I tried to add Chicago and Atlanta and it could not find them!

I loved this widget on my old phone but now that I've downloaded the app on my new phone, I cannot add custom locations which makes this pretty much useless to me. Also, the developers haven't bothered to respond to my question about the issue.

title: Overdrop Weather & Alerts - Real Time Forecast
description:
Get accurate local weather forecast in a fast and simple way, thanks to the minimalistic and modern Overdrop's design.
Powered by the most accurate weather providers such as Accuweather, Dark Sky and WeatherBit, all in one app. 

Be one step ahead, check the weather by choosing one of the 47 custom widgets, made carefully for you.
Overdrop adapts to your style, choose between 6 different unique themes, including AMOLED, to save your battery life.

Features
• Detailed real-time weather data
• Dark Sky weather provider
• WeatherBit weather provider (new)
• AccuWeather weather provider (new)
• 24-hour and 7-day forecast
• Customisable weather notification
• Severe condition alerts
• Optimised for notches and punch hole displays
• 6 themes (including Amoled theme)
• Time, weather, and battery widgets
• ‘At a Glance’ widget from Pixel Launcher

Using widgets
Overdrop widgets are standalone and don't require Zooper or KWGT to be installed.

Our app was included many times in the best Android apps list, by a lot of tech reviewers, check the videos below!

- https://youtu.be/SmVP--QGPiI?t=346

- https://youtu.be/nkZfDHkq2dk?t=137

Also featured by Mrwhosetheboss as one of the best apps of 2020!


Below you can find some interesting articles, where you can see all the positive aspects of getting Overdrop Weather:

comments: Looks really good for the most part, but I don't like the way that the notification works in Android dark mode. What I mean by that is that some of the sliders are inverted in the way that they work and some of the icons (material) don't show up at all because they're supposed to be all white or something (specifically fog). If this small issue was fixed, than I will give it five stars, but I think $7.50 where one of the main features of that price tag doesn't work all of the time isn't right.
Beautiful app but doesn't seem to update as fast as other apps. Had a thunderstorm happen and it reports it as a cloudy day meanwhile other apps report thunderstorms and rain. Shame.

I was told by one of the developers that if one wants to know expected SNOW amounts, one clicks on "RAIN" in the hourly forecast. I guess it's just me, but I find that counterintuitive. Perhaps "rain/snow" would be a better option for that particular click ? Or simply "Precip"? (I will have to wait & see if that works as there is no snow expected here in Vermont for the next week.)
Hands down the best weather app, no other option on the store comes close to it. I wish there were a few more themes, but that would just be icing on the cake.

VERY nice layout and presentation....using lousy data (Dark Sky). Right now Overdrop shows cloudy, drizzle and 80% chance of precipitation. In fact, it's sunny, clear skies and everyone else shows 0% chance of precip. (And, yes, I double-checked the location. This is not the first time I've seen forecasts based on Dark Sky data be this incorrect). It's a shame because it's not really the developers's fault, but there's really no point in keeping this app. Developer replies that they've added "two more" providers. In the free version, I see only one more: Weather Bit, which seems to do better. But to get AccuWeather, you must pay. Review has been increase by 2 stars.

comments: I find it difficult to understand when rain is supposed to occur. The percentage for each day is under the night time icon so does this mean X% chance overnight? Also sometimes the text will say rain all day but the icon shows mostly sunshine. The vertical bar is not explained either. Does this denote total rainfall? Otherwise a nice looking and useful app.

Awesome app BUT... the last update (v2.606) screwed up the "Hourly Trend" widget. It worked fine for about 2 weeks. Now all of sudden the widget does NOT update automatically. I have to force an update by opening the app. On my wish list... I have set updates to occur once per hour. I wish those updates would occur consistently, a few seconds after the top hour (instead of just randomly). Thanks In Advance. (sidenote: re-installed v2.601, widget auto-update works as expected)

I have to say. I'm having a wonderful time with this app. It has replaced all my weather apps up to this point and has established itself as my go-to app whenever I need to inform myself about the weather. The cute animations are particularly pleasing and the info available is not overwhelming as in ome other apps, which is quite refreshing. The app itself is quite easy to use as well. Oh, and did I mention it's completely free? Why yes, yes it is! Seriously, great job with this one! 👏
Amazing app! Would be nice if the multiple cities widget could be used on row and still see the text...
The air quality doesn't show at all and the temperature is always 1 degree more than all the other weather apps i check. Edit: It got fixed. Good job 👍

title: Weather Forecast
description:
Weather Forecast is an accurate weather app that you can rely on. Weather Forecast goes beyond just today's weather and temperature, it has everything you would expect from a weather app. Whenever and wherever you need weather forecast information, Weather Forecast won't let you down. If you need to plan you daily life or trip in advance with weather forecast information or need real-time weather alerts, detailed weather information and beautiful widgets to decorate your desktop, Weather Forecast is your must have.

Storm season is coming, with Weather Forecast you can stay alert from storms, heavy rains, hurricanes, typhoons, or even tornados.

Whether you need to see if you should bring an umbrella for the day or you’re planning a vacation for the weekend, here are the best weather app available for Android right now!

Here's something you must know about Weather Forecast:

💫10-day forecast & 24/72-hour forecast
prepare for more, prepare for longer

💫Detailed information
everything you need is all in Weather Forecast: temperature, air quality, sunrise and sunset time, condition of wind, precipitation, air pressure, visibility, ultraviolet level, satellite cloud photo, probability of rainfall, humidity, dew point, etc

💫Widgets
specially designed for you to decorate your desktop, multiple styles for your choice(continue to update more)

💫Severe weather alerts
Inform you the real-time weather alerts and warnings, keep you safe from heavy rain, hurricanes, typhoons, etc

💫Temperature chart
see the temperature changes clearly

💫Summaries
Forecast for future several days in a few words, check easily without thinking

💫Display weather forecast in status bar (Notification bar)
won't bother to open the app

💫Animated icon based on reality
experience the changes even indoors, Dynamic weather animations make checking the weather a delightful experience

💫Own your weather map
Save multiple locations to create your own weather map, remind people that you care about of the weather, or plan touring trip with Weather Forecast

💫Accurate positioning your position
update weather wherever you are

💫Daily health & life index
Plan your daily life with the advice of experts

💫Multiple language support
Weather Forecast, Prévisions météorologiques, Wettervorhersage, Pronóstico del tiempo, Previsão do tempo, Прогноз погоды, النشرة الجوية, 天气预报, 天氣預報, 天気予報, 날씨, etc.

Download Weather Forecast now and try it for yourself, it won't let you down. It’s easy to scroll through the hours and days to get a glimpse of the weather. Weather Forecast, makes your uncertain future a little more certain.

comments: Love this! So easy see & tons info. No scroll forever to see what you want. AccuWeather is terrible now. Cant get it off my phone! This what weather app SHOULD DO! 2 min to see all. Other taking 5-10 min just see 2 days. EXTREMELY ACCURATE!

This app show slot of things you normally do not see on other weather apps .Not trying to say that the other weather apps don't have them or not better. Actually it is up to the individual about the apps they want.You might want to look at it thought. Everybody have a great day thank you by for now.👋😊👍

Using to much battery and my mobile keeps reminding me. To many ads not what I like. Very good weather forecasts, and good in showing weather and weather alarms, the alarms are very helpful. Sad about the to many ads and excessive battery use but I hope it can be fixed by Google.

This app has several really neat features, and if they all work that would be great. It has really fun and creative widgets, but I can't get any of them to apply to my home screen. Also, it would be really cool if it would say total precipitation amounts expected.
Like the look, like the layout and weather updates are pretty good. But didn't update for daylight savings AND there's no way to manually adjust the cock.

title: Weather - Weather Forecast
description:
Weather forecast  is the best weather app to know daily weather or weather tomorrow is good or not. 
🌦 Main features of Weather Forecast app 
✔️ Weather detail information: display all information of weather about: sunrise time, sunset time, current temperature, date, Foggy, Sun, rain, Tornado, Cloud, snow,Droplet, Cyclone, Fire, Black Droplet, Wind Face,Cloud with Lightning.
✔️ Global weather:  weather forecast for global, for all country. It provides specific information about local weather of different countries such as United States weather (US weather), United Kingdom (UK), Japan, Australia, Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Korea, Spain, Portugal, Finland, Switzerland, South Africa, Denmark, Sweden, India, Singapore, Hong Kong, Indonesia,China, Russia etc.
✔️ Local weather: weather forecast of many other locations especially big cities like New York(nyc weather), California(Los Angeles CA weather), London, Paris, Tokyo, Berlin, Sydney, Rome, Seoul, Jakarta and so on at the same time.
✔️ Hourly weather: weather forecast accurately the weather new among each hour per day. 
✔️ Daily weather: accurate weather forecast every day of the week. 
✔️ Weather chart: weather forecast charts in 24 hours, 7 day forecast and many charts helps users to see easier such as:  temperature charts, rainfall charts, radar maps, solar charts, wind charts, moon charts.
✔️ Weather radar: have weather radar to support for looking wind direction, Rain, Thunder, Temperature, Cloud, Waves, Air vision, Thunderstorms, Humidity, Satellite.
✔️ Weather report: the weather report is updated each hour in each day and even in weather this week.
✔️ Weather news: display history searching positions to see weather news.
✔️ Weather widgets: You can easily view weather information via weather widgets with sizes: 2*1, 4*1, 4*2, 5*1, 5*2.
✔️ Weather notifications: have notifications whenever update new weather information.
✔️ Weather alert: temperature change notification, notify storms, rain, clouds and snow.
✔️ Weather setting: multiple language support, temperature (C/F), time (12 h / 24h), rainfall(mm, inch), wind speed (km / h, mi / h, m / s), pressure (mmHg, hPa, mbar)m.
🛰️ In the pro version of  weather forecast app  you can use advanced features:
✔️ Use advanced features of Weather Radar such as: hurricane tracker,storm tracker, thunderstorm, winter storm, cloud cover, wind direction, temperature, lightning rain, temperature, cloud, river, ocean current, pressure.
✔️ See weather information for the next 14 days.
✔️ See accurate information about the weather forecast of the next 48 hours.

title: Awesome Weather YoWindow + Live Wallpaper
description:
You just found a 🌈 magical weather app!
🌧️ When it's raining outside, it is raining in the app, and people open their umbrellas.

⛅ Scroll the time through the day and watch the weather change. Simply slide your finger from left to right. 

🌅 The sun sets at the same time as in the real world. 🌙 The phase of the moon is real.

🏡 State of the art Living Landscapes.
Birds are singing and animals are strolling about in the Village. People and cars abound in the City. Planes are landing at the Airport. Sheep are grazing in the Valley.

🍂 The landscape changes 5 times a year, to reflect nature changes in your area.

📷 The weather on your photo. YoWindow can show any weather, sunrises, sunsets and the phase of the Moon on a photograph. For example, the view from your window.

🇺🇸 Accurate weather forecast for the USA.
High-precision weather sources - National Weather Service (NWS), Weather Underground, Foreca (nowcasting), yr.no (met.no), METAR, Open Weather Map. The forecast is based on data from national and foreign weather stations, radar and satellite images.

Watch the weather change today, tomorrow, over the week, and even 14 days ahead!

⛅ More weather?
- Water temperature (Foreca).
- “Feels like” temperature.
- Chance of rain (Foreca).
- UV Index.

🗽The app automatically shows the weather at your location. It doesn’t matter where you are right now - in Manhattan, Washington DC, Chicago, LA or San Francisco. You will always have the accurate forecast at your fingertips. 

🍭 Make your Android happy. 
- Temperature on the status bar.
- Weather forecast in the notification area.
- Live wallpaper - animated weather of YoWindow on your desktop.
- Wallpaper on the lock screen.
- Weather widgets (clock and weather widget, weekly weather forecast, 14 day weather forecast, widget for today's weather).
- Radar and Weather Map.
- Alarm clock with the weather — two in one — wake up to the sounds of nature.
- Screensaver (Daydream) "weather on the phone screen."

🌇 Scenic photo-landscapes from cities in the USA and all around the world.
Boston, Frisco, Seattle, New York, Las Vegas, London, Paris, Tokyo and hundreds of others. The photo of the city is reflecting actual weather conditions or the weather forecast.

Enjoy the weather!
YoWindow team.

🏡 State of the art Living Landscapes.
Birds are singing and animals are strolling about in the Village. People and cars abound in the City. Planes are landing at the Airport. Sheep are grazing in the Valley.

🍂 The landscape changes 5 times a year, to reflect nature changes in your area.

📷 The weather on your photo. YoWindow can show any weather, sunrises, sunsets and the phase of the Moon on a photograph. For example, the view from your window.

🇺🇸 Accurate weather forecast for the USA.
High-precision weather sources - National Weather Service (NWS), Weather Underground, Foreca (nowcasting), yr.no (met.no), METAR, Open Weather Map. The forecast is based on data from national and foreign weather stations, radar and satellite images.

Watch the weather change today, tomorrow, over the week, and even 14 days ahead!

⛅ More weather?
- Water temperature (Foreca).
- “Feels like” temperature.
- Chance of rain (Foreca).
- UV Index.

🗽The app automatically shows the weather at your location. It doesn’t matter where you are right now - in Manhattan, Washington DC, Chicago, LA or San Francisco. You will always have the accurate forecast at your fingertips.

🍭 Make your Android happy.
- Temperature on the status bar.
- Weather forecast in the notification area.
- Live wallpaper - animated weather of YoWindow on your desktop.
- Wallpaper on the lock screen.
- Weather widgets (clock and weather widget, weekly weather forecast, 14 day weather forecast, widget for today's weather).
- Radar and Weather Map.
- Alarm clock with the weather — two in one — wake up to the sounds of nature.
- Screensaver (Daydream) "weather on the phone screen."

🌇 Scenic photo-landscapes from cities in the USA and all around the world.
Boston, Frisco, Seattle, New York, Las Vegas, London, Paris, Tokyo and hundreds of others. The photo of the city is reflecting actual weather conditions or the weather forecast.

Enjoy the weather!
YoWindow team.
summary: 🌈Accurate weather. Live scenes reflect weather forecast, day, night, season.
developerAddress: Russia, Saint-Petersburg, Grazhdanskiy pr., 121А/100, PO Box 58
recentChanges:
🥵 🥶 Sudden temperature change notification
If the temperature tomorrow is going to rise or fall by 7 degrees or more.

Tip: double tap the screen to return to the current time (live).
comments: Pretty good, but I can't quite figure out how to change from my home location to current location? Sometimes it works , sometimes it won't. I also can't figure out how to keep it on just my city and not go to a park i have never heard of let alone know it's location. If the developer could help me, I would gladly give if 5☆ ! I do love this app otherwise! Great job!**updated same day Awesome Yo Window explained it to me. It was just stupidity on my part! Lol! Thanks again Yo Window!

Best live wallpaper I've tried. The create landscape feature is really good specially the sky erase with easy but accurate selection. Honestly though, you can improve the UI a little bit for some users might not be able to use all the features, just keep it minimal and organized. Anyways, this app is really underrated imo, I hope it gets the recognition it deserves. Keep creating and innovating! Thank you, YoWindow team for this wonderful app!

when scrolling on the time scale update: can you please fix the scrolling? its very counterintuitive. it should scroll from left to right when you slide your finger from right to left, but its doing the opposite. Best weather and clock widget. Opens weather app and alarm clock. Doesn't take too much space on the screen.

Total waste of time. I have this app on both my Android tablet and Android tv. It gives completely different information for the days and weeks, temp, rain cloud etc... what is going on when they can't even supply accurate information for the same town location, which is just a local forecast. Don't spend any money on this rubbish. Would give no stars if I could.

YoWindow is one of my favorite apps! It's a fun and accurate weather app. I love that the 'live' landscapes are a bit interactive and fun to watch, AND that they change with the seasons and holidays! (I've added it to my tv and computer as well) Two thumbs way up! :)

title: Sense Flip Clock & Weather
description:
A full featured, fully customizable digital clock and weather forecast widget

The widget features the following:

- 3 widget sizes, 4x1, 4x2 and 5x2
- Flip animation
- Several widget skins to choose from
- Different weather icon skins
- Different fonts for the time
- Display the next alarm and week number on the widget (optional)
- Several widget hotspots (most of them can be user defined to launch specific applications)
- Automatic location (from cell/wifi or GPS) or manual
- Automatic weather update interval (15 min, 30 min, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8 hours) or manual
- Hour change notification option
- Detailed current weather forecast display that includes the following:
- Local time (for current location)
- Sunrise and sunset time for current location
- Humidity, pressure, chance of rain, dew point, visibility, UV index and wind conditions
- Current condition, temperature, low and high temperatures
- Last weather update time
- Background according to the weather condition and day/night
- Optional display of the current moon phase
- 24 hourly weather forecast
- 24 hourly wind forecast
- 7 day future forecast
- Future forecast details (sunrise, sunset, moon phase, wind, humidity and chance of rain
- World weather: Choose to display weather information for any number of different locations worldwide
- The application is localized in more than 40 languages

Blog: http://droid27.blogspot.com/
F.A.Q.: http://droid27.blogspot.com/p/faq.html
Website: http://www.machapp.net

Email us if you have any problems or suggestions. We are happy to help!

comments: Great weather and clock for phone however the weather and temperatures are off at times and they don't match up with AccuWeather which always seems to be right. They offer 3 weather providers but not AccuWeather, I hope they add it at some point.
I do like this site. It's easy to get to and it gives me all the information I need. I particularly like it giving me the wind level in my area because I have a retractable awning.

since last update (Feb-2020) this App looks like hanging somewhere: after a while it does not react on touch event - does not open weather app, also I've set to open Clock app when pressing minutes, but it stops opening. After I reboot my phone (OnePlus-7), this functionality starts to work again and stops to work after a few hours.
This is the best weather app I've found. It has lots of options & allows me to easily navigate its features.

The widget is supposed to be, in the three choices, 4x1, 4X2, 4X2. It takes up WAY more room than the actual size of the widget. So my home screen cannot be arranged satisfactorily. A whole row wasted. That is my sole reason for 2 stars.The space issue is so annoying that I may have to find something else. The weather/clock widgets that come on the Samsung Tab S6 are pitiful. That said, the appearance of the widget is very attractive especially after I chose the no background panel in settings.

title: Weather
description:
Real-Time Weather Forecast provides you accurate weather information instantly no matter where you are.

MAIN FEATURES:

★ Accurate Weather Condition
Timely and accurate overall weather condition: real-time temperature, weather, temperature range, etc.

★ 24 Hours Forecast
Provide 24-hour forecast about temperature and weather.

★ 10 Days Forecast 
Provide an overview of the next 10 days' forecast about temperature range and weather.

★ More Information 
Sunrise time, sunset time, humidity, precipitation probability, visibility, wind speed, sensible temperature, etc. Forecasts snow, ice, rain, wind,thunderstorms, sun,fog,cloudy and so on.

★ Worldwide Coverage
Covers tens of thousands of cities and towns all over the world.

★ Accurate Location
Automatically locate your position, exact street address or GPS location.

★ Custom Notification
Make you aware of the weather of the place you concern.

★ Weather Widget 
40 kinds of beautiful weather widgets for you.

★ Clear UI and intuitive navigation.

NOTES:
►	Swipe up and down for more information
►	Swipe left and right to switch location
►	Add more location with the button on the left top corner
►	Change the unit in settings(metric unit/English unit)

 Weather Forecast, your personal weather steward!

Download it for free and enjoy the amazing weather forecasting.

recentChanges: UI Optimized & Bug Fixed
comments: Works great so far. Quick, easy to see weekly high/low and current temperature plus icon for sunny, rainy, etc. Easy to add other cities that are quick to reference. I've had other weather apps that quit refreshing and you might not notice looking at info 2 days old!! I'm pleased with this one.

I have been trying to find an easy to use weather app that just tells me the hourly forecast and I just downloaded four that were exactly the same app but advertised differently, both could not find my very populated location (yes my location is on) and both made my phone freak out. is this some kind of smartphone version of a virus?

I'm using the app for less than 2min and couldn't opt to give a feedback later and continue to use the app. every time I clicked "next time" and tried to add a new location, the feedback window was shown again.
Too hard to read. too much going on on each screen. should be more of a snapshot summary rather them an exhaustive and detailed weather report.
I loved this app in the beginning. It was great! Now, though, I'm trying to add a city and it won't let me. Don't know if its the app or my phone, but its very frustrating!

title: Weather app
description:
This weather app is one of best free weather apps with full features: Local weather, weather map (weather map service) and weather widgets.
Forecastle: Forecast now, hourly forecast and daily forecast app
Widgets for Android: The weather radar widget free and clock widget weather with beautiful style.
Weather map, weather radar map: Local weather radar app free with a lot of radar scope: Rain/snow, temperature, pressure, windy, clouds, humidity, waves, … and storm radar.

Its so easy to receive the weather conditions in your current location.
Weather forecast app provides detailed local forecast & weather forecast world wide, the app provides the current temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit, sunrise and sunset time according to city time zone.
The weather app also provides atmospheric pressure, weather conditions, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction, in addition to ten days in future and hourly weather forecast.
Realtime temperature, humidity, pressure and wind direction are all in the weather app based.

Great features:
- The weather channel: temperature, wind, air sunshine, humidity, dew point, precipitation, visibility, atmosphere pressure, water, sunrise sunset, storm, stormshield, rain alert in one wetter app
- Hourly or daily prediction: we offer 7 days info, the weather now, hourly weather free in each hour, today’s weather, tomorrow’s weather
- Animated weather conditions with live background images
- Hourly and weekly forecastle, especially hourly weather item for next 7 days.
- World weather report: we provide worldwide weather forecast
- Weather alerts: provide local weather alerts 3 times a day.
- No GPS: not a problem, app can detect network location, not so accurate but its ok for some cases
- Storm warning & notification: Storm radar, storm tracker, tornado warning and rain alarm - rain radar
- Reporting: the weather news can show up everyday if you enable it.
- Sunrise time, sunset time & water time
- Temperature converter: Temperature free switching between Celsius and Fahrenheit, auto-detect your country should use Celsius or Fahrenheit for default settings.
- Wind speed and wind direction in different units
- Wind guru tool: wind forecast by wind speed meter, wind finder
- 1 day, 7 days future prediction with accurate el tiempo, plus tempo data for future hourly weather
- Weather widget (weather on homescreen) and ongoing notification with forecast bar, multiple place on widgets.
- Auto reload data for notification even app is in underground
- Weather notification bar: Keeps weather running underground for realtime, you can see the temperature on android system bar without opening app
- Lock screen with info: temps, rain, clouds & clock widget weather
- Track the whether in multiple locations
- Chance of rain, moon phrase, moon cycle
- Great wether radar with animated maps

Download accurate weather app right now to plan your trips, work & your life!

comments: An exceptional weather app ..I used to have Weather Underground and a few other ones and this now for me as of this posti is by far the best one! The app is very informative and I live in a rural area of Southern New Hampshire in Cheshire County and this is super accurate. Our weather here changes very quickly and it seems this app is very much right on top of it plus it gives me notifications of high winds as it did earlier today so I'm delighted with the app I think you will be too ..

just downloaded so trying it out. so far so good. Been using it for over 6 months. I like the feature that I can add as many cities as I like to track. Lots of good info. Has worked well until now. I don't know what changed, but the temperature is wrong.

Glad you have honed in the most on our temps. Most had our airport as our location and beingthat we are way up above that area, it affects our temps which varies greatly, from down in town. Thanks for not using our local airport for our temps. Your location for our weather temps is more accurate for us up here.
Very easy to use and the most accurate weather app I've ever used. All the information I want is one page. With more detailed information easily accessible if I want it.
Excellent Weather App! I've had them all in the past but this one gives you everything you need to plan for the day & the week ahead.No problems with my Maxx2 cell either.

title: Weather
description:
☀️ Weather app will forecast thunderstorm, rainy, snowfall ✨

With one click to enable GPS location and you receive the weather condition in your current location.
Weather provides detailed current weather forecast and weather observation for all world locations, Weather forecast searches for your address automatically, and provides the current temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit, sunrise and sunset times according to city time zone.
Weather forecast also provides current atmospheric pressure, weather condition, visibility distance, relative humidity, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction, in addition to ten days future forecast and hourly weather forecast.
Realtime temperature, humidity, pressure, wind force and wind direction are all in this weather app based.

This accurate weather app allows to find out a detailed forecast wherever you are, for any time of the day or for the next 7 days just by tapping on the icons:
- Wind speed and direction
- Pressure and precipitation information 
- Sunrise/sunset time
- Weather Radar & Rain maps
and other useful weather data accompanied by live animations and graphics.

Weather app has a lot of features:
- Free. It is a free Weather channel, weather network.
- It's VERY FAST and ACCURATE
- Modern UI design and easy to use
- Global. You can see weather in any places you like, ex: London weather, Paris weather, San Francisco weather, Houston weather
- Various weather information: temperature, wind, humidity, dew point, precipitation, visibility, pressure, sunrise, sunset
- View weather information at multiple locations
- Hourly or daily. we offer 7 days - 10 days info: today’s weather, tomorrow’s weather, … and hourly weather in each hour.
- Weather supports geo-positioning, retrieving the latest weather conditions for your current location
- Weather app support almost languages over the world.
- An option to manually add your location. Automatic location detection by network and GPS.
- Add and track the weather conditions in multiple locations
- Animated weather conditions - see how the weather comes alive!
- Hourly and weekly forecasts
- Temperature: switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit
- You can allow and disable the notifications
- Current weather condition without needing to add manually
- Atmospheric pressure in many different units
- Wind speed and direction in different units
- 1 day, 10 days future forecast and hourly weather forecast.
- Sunset and Sunrise times.
- Shares weather, location information with friends.
- Display weather forecast or moon phase
- Localized to most of the world languages.
- Chart graphs for hourly weather forecast and daily weather forecast
- Weather widget and ongoing notification, multiple location on widget
- Option to set lock screen with live weather information
- Give right weather even GPS is not enabled, awesome!
- If you are living in big city like New York, London you don’t need to enable GPS, the app can detect right location over network and give exactly info such cities, in this case giving exact info for weather New York, weather London. Otherwise if you see the app does not detect right location please enable GPS.
- Easy to update your location when you moving, both network and GPS supported

Enjoy the perfect and accurate weather forecast!
Please send any question to email: weather.droidteam@gmail.com, we will support 24/7 for your demand.

comments: App works fine. The only problem is that it drops saverd cities a couple times a month requiring them to be re- entered. Update: 2/17/2020 dropped saved locations again. Frustrating.
Have the paid version and regardless of what I set frequency of updates to, it will only update manually or on a phone restart. Also, does not update GPS location. This app is junk.
Just installed about a week ago & I love this weather app.! So far, it's been very accurate and I love knowing the approximate time the rain is going to start!
Accuracy is ok, but future weather alerts come out in the middle of the night and wake me up unnecessarily. Even if the alert is still 48 hours away.
It is pretty accurate, but needs to be updated in the evening. It says we are sunny here this evening (6:15 p.m.) and it's almost dark. Definitely no sun.

This is a great app especially for me. I'm a Weather Watcher for a local news station. The only complaint I have is that the Weather XL Pro won't play on my home screen or locked screen. The Widgets work fine, just live weather part isn't working I even configured the app. Thank you.

title: Severe Weather! (weather warnings)
description:
This app alerts you when severe weather is possible. Warnings are issued from official sources when weather conditions have the potential to become a threat to life and property. Additionally a probability indicator is included, where available.
Depending on the country, it warns of weather dangers like cyclones, tornadoes, thunderstorms, hail, heavy rain, snow, freeze, slipperiness, heat, heavy wind, fog, flood or marine warnings.

Features:
• Alerts to every type of severe weather
• Alert as a notification with vibration and/or sound
• Intuitive map overview
• Handy widget

The data is collected from governmental weather services. Works in the USA (including Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Guam), Canada, Australia, Brazil, Germany, Poland, Netherlands, France, Luxembourg, Sweden, Norway, Spain, Portugal, Slovenia, Croatia,Taiwan.

In-app purchases:
• No more ads
• Additional alarm settings including more sounds
• Multiple locations (for alarms)

Follow us on Twitter for the latest news: https://twitter.com/severeWeatherA

Looking for a replacement for Pro Weather Alert or AlertsPro? You've come to the right place!


Warning types per country

USA: Fire, Geological, Heat, Freeze, Freezing rain, Freezing fog, Snow, Blowing snow, Winter weather, Sleet, Avalanche, Thunderstorm, Cyclone, Wind, Tornado, Visibility, Air stagnation, Waves, Tsunami, Beach, Flood, Low water, Ice accretion, Marine, Special weather, Civil, Law, Health, Infrastructure

Canada: Heat, Temperature drop, Freeze, Freezing rain, Snow, Blowing snow, Winter weather, Rain, Thunderstorm, Cyclone, Wind, Tornado, Visibility, Flood, Marine, Special weather, Health

Australia: Fire, Freeze, Slipperiness, Snow, Winter weather, Rain, Hail, Thunderstorm, Cyclone, Wind, Tornado, Visibility, Waves, Tsunami, Flood, Marine, Special weather, Health

Brazil: Fire, Drought, Heat, Humidity, Temperature drop, Freeze, Snow, Rain, Hail, Thunderstorm, Wind, Tornado, Waves

Germany: High UV index, Heat, Freeze, Slipperiness, Thaw, Snow, Blowing snow, Rain, Thunderstorm, Wind, Visibility

Poland: Heat, Freeze, Slipperiness, Rain, Thunderstorm, Wind, Visibility, Waves

Netherlands: Heat, Freeze, Slipperiness, Snow, Blowing snow, Rain, Thunderstorm, Wind, Tornado, Visibility

Luxembourg: Heat, Temperature drop, Slipperiness, Snow, Rain, Thunderstorm, Wind, Visibility, Flood, Special weather, Health

Spain: Heat, Freeze, Thaw, Freezing fog, Snow, Avalanche, Rain, Thunderstorm, Cyclone, Wind, Visibility, Air stagnation, Waves, Meteotsunami, Marine

Taiwan: Fire, Geological, Drought, Space, High UV index, Heat, Freeze, Freezing rain, Freezing fog, Blowing snow, Winter weather, Avalanche, Rain, Hail, Thunderstorm, Cyclone, Wind, Tornado, Foehn, Visibility, Waves, Tsunami, Flood, Civil, Law, Health, Aid, Infrastructure

Sweden: Fire, Heat, Slipperiness, Snow, Rain, Thunderstorm, Wind, Flood, Low water, Ice accretion, Special weather

Norway: Fire, Snow, Blowing snow, Rain, Thunderstorm, Cyclone, Wind, Flood, Ice accretion, Special weather

title: Free Weather Forecast App Widget
description:
🏆 More than 50 million users’ choice! A Popular weather widget app for you!🏆
This weather widget is a full featured, completely customizable digital clock and weather forecast app.


With this weather forecast app, you can get daily and hourly forecasts, severe weather alerts, daily&7 day weather updates, fancy clock weather widgets, weather news and global weather. 

————Features————

Realtime local temperature checker & live local weather 

This clock weather app displays weather temperature based on your current location. You can also add more cities to your city list, so that you can check global weather anytime.

Hourly forecasts

Before you go out, you can check this free weather app to get prepared for unexpected weather changes. In addition, you can also check hourly temperature and rain probability to plan your outdoor activities.

Daily weather

Besides, you can also check today&tomorrow forecasts (7 day weather forecasts) with this temperature app. With this accurate weather report app, you won’t get caught in the rain again!

Severe weather alerts

This climate app can also turn into a global weather tracker and it can send you severe weather alerts to help you get prepared for upcoming weather changes.

So in another word, you can see it as a rain app of minute-level precision, as it can inform you these severe weather and sudden temperature change ahead of time.

Distinctive clock weather widgets & weather themes

This weather pro app is packed with different weather themes and temperature clock widgets to decorate your home screen. In addition, these weather widgets for android also display radar information like accurate outside temperature, forecasts, sunrise time and sunset time, humidity, air pressure, wave, UV, and cloud info.

Free weather radar

In our store, you can also find many customized widgets with free radar to decorate your phone. With the help of weather satellite map, you can check weather more intuitively. 

Detailed weather updates

In this daily and hourly weather app, you can get more than just temperatures and clock. You can check humidity, visibility, UV index, air pressure, wind speed, sunrise time, sunset time in different units.

Global weather coverage

This accurate weather app enables you to add global cities on your check list and get real-time local weather forecast information. Feel free to take this weather app with you everywhere you go worldwide!

Weather news
This world weather app is not just about weather. In this temperature checker, you can get the latest news covering society, entertainment and sports. 

Daily weather updates brief
Users can choose to receive daily weather updates brief report in the morning and evening to check weather today and weather tomorrow. 


Stay in touch
If you would like to help with the translation and localization, please write to: weather_support@amberweather.com

And also the litter of puppies he just had!

Makes me very happy to see the puppies everyday plus informed of the weather. The only feature I wish it had was a small list of stats (not necessary but helpful / fun ) I've seen on some weather apps - telling allergy index, if need umbrella, if good weather for running etc . But honestly id rather have puppies fetch my weather and I can figure that part out myself. (However, if the developers are reading this and want to add these or port them in from another app, would make this app even )

title: The Weather Network: Local Forecasts & Radar Maps
description:
The Weather Network provides the same quality forecasts as our Canadian tv weather channel! Enjoy quick access to radar maps, local forecast, and severe weather alerts.

DISCOVER accurate local weather forecasts! Learn about today, tomorrow, and beyond with our weather forecast screens. 

PLAN for storms using current weather reports! Monitor severe snow and rain storms with helpful graphs for local weather. 

PREPARE for severe weather with storm alerts! Receive current and upcoming severe weather alerts.    

UNDERSTAND the storm’s impact with weather radar maps! Analyze current weather trends with our animated storm radar map. 

EXPERIENCE local weather news and videos! Enjoy extensive weather coverage straight from our Canadian tv weather channel! 

EXPLORE today’s weather and become a forecaster! Weather GPS targeted photos allow you to help others by sharing today’s current weather in your local community. 

Details:

Current location
The Weather Network app allows you to use your current location to always know the weather around you! This feature gives you the most accurate forecast within a 1km (0.6 mi) of your current location.

Weather Forecasts
Need local, accurate weather forecasts in places like Dallas, Orlando, or Philadelphia? Then trust Canada’s best weather app to know what the forecast will be! Whether it’s planning for tomorrow’s weather or today’s weather, The Weather Network has you covered. Our Canadian tv weather channel can predict 14 days of reliable temperatures. The Weather Network also has hourly forecasts, and is updated every 15 minutes. These local weather forecasts include wind speeds, feels like temperature, and more!

Weather Radar Maps
Trying to arrive on time but you heard about a severe weather alert? Our accurate weather radar map ensures that you can see the size of the storm, and what the forecast will be like around you! 

News & Video
Continue the story from our Canadian tv weather channel with weather videos! Unsure about what the forecast will be in your area? Concerned about whether dark skies above Detroit or Washington will impact you? Our video commentary ensures that our entire weather station and meteorology team is keeping you free of doubt! 

Alerts
Canada’s best weather app provides weather alerts when warnings are issued. These weather alerts ensure that you’re always one step ahead of the storm when you see a dark sky!

Rain and Snow Graphs
Get more information on active weather with our precipitation graphs! Our weather app provides start/stop times in the next 3 hours with a precision of 10 minutes. 

Reports
Check out our pollen, UV, and air quality reports and be worry free!. Each report is updated routinely to give you the best picture of your day!

Weather Widget
Canada’s best weather app also provides current weather data on our weather widgets! The weather widgets contain hourly weather periods, feels like temperatures, and forecast conditions all at a glance! The widget comes in many sizes and can be set to any location, including Cleveland, Phoenix, and Fresno. 

We’d love to hear from you! Feel free to send feedback: androidfeedback@pelmorex.com. 

The content of our Canadian tv weather channel is also available at: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheWeatherNetwork

https://www.facebook.com/theweathernetworkCAN/ and Twitter https://twitter.com/weathernetwork 

By installing this app, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and our Privacy Policy. To learn more, visit: https://www.theweathernetwork.com/about-us/privacy-policy.

recentChanges: In this release we have made improvements to the “3 Hour Precipitation” forecast product by making the data more accurate and more reliable.
comments: Unreliable. This app hasn't been working on my Android for the past few weeks. Keep getting "Sorry, the current conditions are unavailable at this time. Please try again later". "We are experiencing technical issues". I've tried uninstalling the app thinking it's related to a recent update. No help! 🤔🙄

the widget drains battery crazily.now it becomes the second battery user in the phone. can you developer shut off the automatic searching for wifi/dataflow and info updating after trying for 2times every hour? i dont have wifi and dataflow all the time. after updating to the most recent version, the widget drains so much battery and becomes the second battery consumer just after android os. after closing the widget the battery life goes back to normal status. disappointed toward this update...

Easy to use and understand weather descriptions and very easy to find out how the day to the next couple days are supposed to unfold. Thanks for not over complicating the user experience and still keeping it accurate and reliable.
Sure to keep you up to speed on the weather as it rises and dips, from hot to warm to bitterly cold and everything in between. The event notification feature is particularly remarkable.
It's good, much more accurate than Google's weather. However, I wish the widget was more sleek and transparent as to not disrupt my homescreen.

title: Weather Liveº
description:
Meet Weather Live. The most beautiful weather app. Ever.

Don't let bad weather take you by surprise! Set the gorgeous animated wallpapers with live weather conditions on your home screen and be aware of any weather that is coming your way. Whether it is cloudy, rainy, snowy or even stormy outside, Weather Live will provide you with current weather conditions and forecast in your city and multiple locations all around the world. 

Cold or warm weather, it will magically come alive on the crisp screen of your device. You won’t even have to look out the window as Weather Live will make you feel like you are already outside! With an innovative technology Weather Live implemented into the app, we made it possible! 

• Weather forecasts for multiple locations all around the world
• Live weather scenes reflecting real-time weather conditions
• Beautiful weather widgets
• Fabulous animated wallpaper with live weather conditions right on your home screen
• Cloud, satellite, rain maps
• Animated weather radar for any location in the USA
• Bad weather warnings and alerts to warn you about severe weather in your area. Data provided by National Weather Service
• Customizable layout. Choose weather parameters you want to be displayed in the layout settings
• Local time in 12 or 24-hour format
• 7-day and 24-hour weather forecast
• "Feels Like" temperature. Today’s Min and Max
• Wind direction and speed. Visibility details
• Humidity and precipitation information. Pressure in inches, mm or mbar
• Fahrenheit or Celsius and Miles or Kilometers
• Easy navigation between cities: swipe either to the left or to the right to switch between locations
• New York, Los Angeles, Chicago or any other location worldwide – get accurate weather forecasts wherever you are!

Get Weather Live and be prepared for any weather!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

recentChanges:
Do you feel that? The breeze of the long-awaited update is finally blowing, bringing plenty of adjustments and an exciting novelty: the “Sea” section! It’s a blast for those living close to the sea and ocean or planning a vacation there: check available info on water temperature and more.
We also did fix some bugs and worked hard on performance and stability improvements.
Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.
comments: I love this app because it gives you alot of details in the weather not only does it tell you the weather it shows you a map,when the sun will rise and go down, and when the moon rises and goes down. and there is sooooooo much more. That is why I love this app!!!!!!

Weather Live INCREDIBLE! The live maps,unlimited city list are great! Seeing how family weather is around the nation and the world! Plus ALL Weather alerts! EXCELLENT! And mobile so you can track where you are and where you're going LIVE! I hope they allow us to access our own private location to study and compare our higher elevation info. to the lower elevation info. around us.Every season r garden plants flowers and trees are always different n growth color and life from the lower elevation!

I like the way the information is presented, but I do NOT like the fact that I can't get rid of the moving backround. I would prefer a solid color backround. I find the moving background distracting. UPDATE- turning off "animation" helps by setting a static background, which is much better than the same background in motion, at least to me.

Why do I need to sign in to be able to utilize the full functionality of this app? Seems to me it's to share my info and I don't give my consent for that. "Beautiful weather app" or not, Granite offers a NOAA Weather (unofficial) app that you don't have to sign in/create account to be able to use all the parameters in their app. So glad play pass let me try this for free before buying!

Great application, great support. I'm using Weather Live for quite a while, even way back when I used an Xperia phone. Accurate details, and very stable application. Love the widget, pretty informative, and besides, vey good supporting staff there at the back office. Get back to you ASAP and do their best to help out when needed. Thank you guys ❤️

title: Weather Forecast
description:
The weather forecast, one of the best weather app, is free to provide the most accurate daily weather and even hourly forecasts, severe weather alerts, daily weather updates, storm forecasts, weather widgets, weather radar, and global weather! 🛰 🚀🌪

 Information about local weather forecasts, real-time temperature, storm, rainfall, snow, humidity, pressure, wind force, and wind direction is all in this weather app! ☀️ 🌤 ⛅️ 

Weather Forecast detects weather in your current location automatically. There are many information in it, which includes weather condition, atmospheric pressure, relative humidity, visibility distance, precipitation in different unites, dew point, wind speed and direction, weather report for the next ten days as well as hourly weather forecast! 💧 💦 ☔️

🌦 Weather forecast features
-Provide Weather forecast for global. All are free with hourly, weekly, daily, update in real-time
- Show today's weather, tomorrow's weather, the next 10 days' weather and will update each hour
- Localize to most of the world languages
- Add and track the weather conditions in multiple locations
- Show air quality, including index of PM 2.5, PM 10, SO2, NO2, O3, CO
- Satellite image & Weather radar
- Predict the next 10 days' rainfalls
- Tell the time of sunset and sunrise 
- Arrange real-time update widget with trendy-design(continue to update more)
- Demonstrate Daily Life Index
- Provide severe weather alerts & storm forecast
- Permit or forbid the notifications
- Show chart graphs for hourly and daily weather forecast, probability of rainfall, condition of wind and air quality
- Enjoy weather widget and ongoing notification, multiple locations on the widget
- Update various weather information: Real feel temperature, wet bulb temperature, wind direction, wind speed, gust, ultraviolet level and intensity, humidity, dew point, precipitation, visibility, pressure, cloud cover, sunrise, sunset
- Show weather information of past 24 hour: precipitation, max & min temperature
- Weather supports geo-positioning, retrieving the latest weather conditions for your current location (Automatic location detection by network and GPS)
- Change unit setting: Temperature (℃/℉), Time format (12h/24h), Precipitation (mm, cm), wind speed (km/h, mi/h, m/s), pressure (mbar, mmHg, inHg, Pa)， visibility(miles, km) 
- 3 theme styles for your choice
- Heating and cooling remind: set the temperature to suit yourself

🌪 Severe weather alerts
This weather app can also be turned into a global weather tracker and it can send you severe weather alerts to help you get prepared for upcoming weather changes, like stormy weather, heatwave, thunderstorm, heavy rainfall and so on. 

🌏 Weather forecast for global, for all countries: 
United States, Japan, Korea, Canada, Brazil, United Kingdom, Sweden, Denmark, Italy, Germany, France, Portugal, Spain, India, Indonesia, Mexico, Finland, Norway, Russia, China, Australia, Vietnam ...

🌆 Weather forecast for all cities: 
Washington, New York, California, San Francisco, Texas, Georgia, Florida, Ottawa, Hawaii, Toronto, Dallas, Nashville, Kansas City, London, Rome, Madrid, Oslo, Paris, Nancy, Dijon, Brest, Marseille, Rennes, Reims, Chamonix, Lyon, Metz, Grenoble, Strasbourg, Berlin, Tokyo, Singapore, Hong Kong, Hanoi, Osaka, Seoul...

The weather forecast is very helpful for everybody. If you know weather information, You can prepare your plan carefully, which is beneficial to both your work and daily life.❄️ ☃️ ⛄️

Come and download this most accurate free weather forecast app, it will become your personal weather station!

comments: I like this weather app. However, as of March 9th 6:30am EDT, it hasn't observed the daylight saving time. In the US, the daylight saving time started on March 8th in 2020. It's still one hour behind. Please fix this fundamental issue immediately. EDIT: at around noon, the time was shifted an hour forward. So, it's now correct!
I love that they give more readings than other apps, like humidity temps. Its a great working app and doesn't feel instrusive with ads like others can.
Too many ads. Installed less than 1 minute and 4 ads displayed. Uninstalled immediately.
The app is worth using. It doesn't take time to load, and also the themes are beautiful.
Nice app. Gives information in requested format, except for ceiling which seems only to come in meters.

title: Weather forecast
description:
The weather forecast is a beautiful and free app. Update your local weather with icons come alive for all weather conditions.
The weather channel is a very useful application for everybody, designed to be as simple, easy to use. Update local weather where you live so quickly and easily. With just a few clicks you can check the weather for today: temperature, precipitation, humidity, UV index...; the weather forecast tomorrow; forecast for the next 3 days; and forecast for the next week.

This free app accurately forecasts local weather: sunshine, rain, temperature, humidity, UV index, etc. for each minute and each specific location.

Weather applications show real climate states in hourly, daily. You can check out is seeing what's the weather today!

THE WEATHER CHANNEL FEATURES

- Updated weather forecast information free accurate daily, weekly.
- Accurate precipitation forecasts for each locality and region around the world, including rainfall, intensity, wind pressure, etc.
- Weather forecast for today, tomorrow, the next 3 days, even extended the weather forecast of the next 10 days in the provinces /cities of countries around the world such as Canada, United States, United Kingdom, Sweden , Denmark, Italy, Germany, France, Portugal, Spain, Finland, Norway, Japan, Korea, China, Vietnam, ...
- Weather forecast channel displays the information: Temperature, humidity, fog, sunshine, rain, UV index, wind symbol, pressure, sunrise /sunset.
- Warning of extreme weather conditions in the current locations such as ice, snow, thunder, lightning, hail, etc.
- Weather forecast has beautiful widgets, animations suitable for all phones and great experiences on all tablets and smartphones from Android
- Live weather forecast for free, it provides interstate travel weather forecasts, cities, countries in the world.
- Automatically detects your location and retrieves the latest weather conditions for your current location.
- Weather notifications in status bar can help you better plan your day and your travels with weather warnings and alerts updates.
- Add and track weather forecast for all your favorite cities and destinations: Washington, New York, Ottawa, London, Rome, Madrid, Oslo, Paris, Berlin, Tokyo, Singapore, ...
- Stay update the latest weather forecast channel for your phone. You can share weather apps and invite your friends on Facebook using the weather channel.
- The app and the weather data is available in over 30 languages

comments: I have few thoughts on this free app: 1- The app does not rotate. My eyesight is bad, so I normally turn my phone or tablet "landscape" to increase the "real estate" to read. But this app is "portrait" mode only. 2- The app gives an 8 days forecast, and listed the percentage of each day's chance of rain. But when I checked for detail, such as what hour will rain the hardest, the percentages during the day do not match (or add up). This needs to be explained... Otherwise, it's good app to use

Excellent weather app, the best one out there I have EVER found. Very accurate ,I will be sticking with this app no matter what!...Keep up the brilliant work guys. UPDATE: I doesn't find my location now, it always use to pinpoint me in my street, now just says current location. If I search for my area it will not find it. Downgrading to 3* until this is sorted
Excellent. It just identify current location but it does not mention current location name, further more it works well.
Wonderful!!!! WOW absolutely amazing. The accuracy is mind blowing .

Generally like the whole layout and breakdown of time and weather conditions. Have difficulty getting the app to default to my home location. Often need to delete other visited cities to get it to focus on home location.

title: Weather Live
description:
⛅ The Weather App with new weather radar and weather live forecast update at realtime. 
⛅ Special technology assistant to help you plan for outdoor activities in conjunction with weather forecast.

- Weather Live App make it simple to get Weather Forecast for your location or practically anywhere with weather radar, easy to view the current weather conditions all day.

- At a glance, the weather live provides the most important weather information base on the data is updated from weather radar photographs

- Keep track of your current location - the Weather Live Forecast can keep track of your current live local weather and update the weather as you travel or outdoor activities

- Sunrise time & sunset time, moonrise & moonset, moon phase and major upcoming moon phases

- Current temperature, weather condition, weather icon, feels like temperature and day high and low temperatures

- Weather live are primarily about knowing what to wear in the morning, planning day trips, or deciding what to pack for vacation and business trips. Not just the weather forecast, this Weather app also can be an assistant to your upcoming outdoor activity plans like cycling, swimming, rowing or running.

🌞 The users need forecasts that are easy to understand quickly, live weather detector and perhaps a little more detail via weather radar photographs, such as when rain or snow is expected to start or stop, or what time the sun will rise or set. Weather enthusiasts will always need more in-depth data, of course, but the average person seeking a basic weather app will have a hard time doing better than Weather Live - Forecast. 

🌞 Weather Live is a full-featured, completely customizable weather forecast widget. Weather Live lets you check on the latest accurate weather forecast, while also giving warnings about bad weather for your future outdoor plans. With it, you can get weather information conveniently. It provides accurate local weather radar like highest/lowest temperature and current weather conditions.

🌈 If you plan to operate outdoors on a future date, the weather live will give advice or warnings based on the smart assistant system, the data is collected through weather radar indicators many years ago to the present time. That’s why this live weather app is really essential for everyone, especially those who often operate outdoors.

🍁 Features

❆ Weather Live - See current weather, weather for the day and next 7 days

❆ Follow the Air Quality Index (AQI) - Assess air pollution

❆ Show the air humidity, wind speed and the air pressure

❆ Weather Radar - Map of wind, wind direction, storm, rainfall, and global temperature

❆ See animated sunrise, sunset, wind, and pressure modules

❆ Smart assistant - Timer notification in the morning and afternoon of temperature information and the possibility of rain during the day - Integrated weather forecast

❆ Weather widget - 9 widget style appropriate to coordinate Typography with many different backgrounds

🍁 Upcoming features
❆ Smart notice of the day's weather
❆ Rain / Storm warning 1 hour in advance - Realtime weather radar photograph
❆ Outdoor planning (running, cycling, sailing, climbing, picnics ...) 
❆ Planning for travel or work (bad weather warning before 1 week and 1 day)
❆ Weather assistant - Help you plan, track the right time for outdoor activities, check the weather that is suitable for outdoor activities

( Example: I want to ride this week! The weather assistant will look for a good time and inform you when you can be able to ride outdoors, when you plan an assistant to help you regularly check the weather changes and then timely notice )

🍁 Notify the weather situation for your plan in the future, especially outdoor activities such as cycling, jogging, sailing or picnic based on information of wind speed, air humidity, temperature, wind speed and air quality.

If you have any questions or ideas, please contact us via email: app@adtrue.com
